f.d: [28. de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ldan du bzhud pa dang / gshegs pa dang / bzhugs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i le'u]
BOOK TWENTY-THREE. Ascent to the Palace of the Tushita Heaven
bam po nyi shu dgu pa/

de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang gling bzhi pa 'di la sogs pa gling re re na yang de bzhin gshegs rnams bzhugs par snang ngo/ / byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung na yang 'khod par shes so/ /

THEN, BY THE SPIRITUAL POWER of the Buddha, in each continent Jambu of every world in the ten directions was seen the Buddha sitting under a tree, at each of which were enlightening beings imbued with spiritual power from the Buddha expounding the teaching, each thinking themselves to be always face to face with the Buddha.

bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de phyir ma brtul/ byang chub kyi shing drung yang phyir ma brtul/ ri rab kyi rtse mo yang phyir ma brtul bar rab mtshe ma'i gnas nas dga' ldan gyi gnas kyi lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyi khang pa rin po che'i rgyan ces bya ba gang na bder gshegs par snang ngo/ / ji ltar gling bzhi pa 'di na bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas su gshegs par snang ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa dag na yang bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas su gshegs par snang ste/ byin gyi rlabs snga ma de dag kyang ma 'khrug par snang ngo/ /

At that time the Buddha, again by spiritual power, went to the palace adorned by all exquisite jewels in the Tushita heaven of satisfaction and happiness, yet without leaving the foot of the enlightenment tree and the palace of the Suyama heaven on the peak of Mt. Sumeru.

de nas lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyis rgyang ma nas bcom ldan 'das khang pa rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan par gshegs pa mthong nas rings pa'i gzugs su khang pa rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i nang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng+ge'i gdan nor bu rin po che las byas pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyu las bsgrubs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rgyu las yongs su grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs/ kyis byung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa mang pos byung ba/
sangs rgyas thams cad las byung ba'i chos dkar po las byung ba/ bsod nams kyi stobs mtha' yas pa sna tshogs thams cad dang ldan pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i rnam par smin pa thams cad kyis rnam par dag pa/ mi mthun pa med pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyis byung ba/ gos pa med pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du byung ba/ thub pa med pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa/ bog re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus brgyan pa;
gser gyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun tu bres pa/ me tog gi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas bres pa/ phreng ba'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas lding ba/ spos kyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spos kun tu 'thul bar sbyar ba/ rin po che'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu steng nas bkab pa/ me tog gi gdugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bsgrengs pa/ rin po che'i gdugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bkab pa/ gdan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mngon par bting ba/ rin po che'i pu shu bya ba brgya stong phrag bcu rgyan du bsgrubs pa/ nor bu'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu rnam par phye bas g.yogs par byas pa/ rin po che'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'khor kun tu g.yogs pa/ rin po che'i phreng ba 'chang ba'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu dbyangs pas bkab pa/ lhab lhub kyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu klubs shing brgyan pa/ gdugs kyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas khebs par bkab pa/ gos sna tshogs kyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sna tshogs su g.yogs pa/
rin po che'i pad+mo'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu rgyas par bkram pa/ spos rin po che'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'thul zhing yid du 'ong bar dri zhim pa/ rin po che'i bla re chen po'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i rgyan chen po brgyan par bres pa/
rin po che'i dril bu'i rgyan gyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i sgra phyung ba/ tsan+dan rin po che'i mdog lta bu'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong bar bkab pa/
rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu me tog shin tu rgyas pa/ gos kha dog mtha' yas pa'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sna tshogs su snang bar bkab pa/
byang chub sems dpa'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sna tshogs su kun nas bkab pa/ gdugs kyi bla re kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu g.yogs shing rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ba/
gser gyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong bar bkab cing rnam par dag par byas pa/ bai DUr+ya'i bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lha rdzas dri ma med cing shin tu dag par byas pa/ snying po sna tshogs can gyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bla rer bkab pa/

The celestial king of the Tushita heaven, seeing from afar the Buddha’s advent, set up a jewel mine lion seat in the palace; that lion throne was made of a collection of celestial jewels obtained from roots of goodness cultivated in the past, made manifest by the spiritual powers of all Buddhas, born of countless hundreds of thousands of millions of billions of roots of goodness,
created by the pure teachings of all enlightened ones, adorned by the power of infinite virtue. Resulting from pure actions, it was indestructible, endlessly delightful to all beholders. Its transcendental qualities were not influenced by the world. Though all sentient beings come to gaze on it, none could exhaustively fathom its glories. There were a hundred trillion tiers all around it,
with a hundred trillion gold webs, a hundred trillion flower curtains, a hundred trillion jewel curtains, a hundred trillion garland curtains, and a hundred trillion incense curtains hung above it. Garlands of flowers hung down, their scent perfuming everywhere. A hundred trillion canopies of flowers, a hundred trillion canopies of garlands, and a hundred trillion canopies of jewels were held by various celestial beings arrayed in rows on all four sides. A hundred trillion precious robes were spread on it. A hundred trillion balconies radiantly adorned it, with a hundred trillion nets of pearls and a hundred trillion nets of jewels covering above, while a hundred trillion nets of necklaces hung down on all four sides. A hundred trillion nets of ornaments, a hundred trillion nets of canopies, a hundred trillion nets of robes, and a hundred trillion nets of jewel tapestries were hung above.
A hundred trillion nets of jewel lotuses in full bloom with glorious light, a hundred trillion nets of incense with exquisite fragrance delighting everyone,
a hundred trillion curtains of jewel chimes moving gently producing harmonious elegant sounds, a hundred trillion curtains of precious sandalwood, its fragrance perfuming the air,
a hundred trillion curtains of precious flowers in full bloom, a hundred trillion curtains of raiment of various subtle hues, rare in the world,
a hundred trillion curtains showing enlightening beings, a hundred trillion multicolored curtains,
a hundred trillion gold curtains, a hundred trillion lapis lazuli curtains, and a hundred trillion curtains of various jewels, were all hung above.

rin po che thams cad kyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i nor bu rin po che bzang pos shin tu mdzes shing khebs par bkab pa/ rin po che'i rgyan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus phyogs thams cad bkang ba/
rin po che'i gzugs brnyan gyi bla re bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu rnam par che zhing mdzes par brgyan pa/ rin po che'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus phreng ba kun tu 'brel bar brgyan pa/ spos kyi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mchod pa la tshul dang mthun pa'i spos kyi dri zhim par byas pa/ lha la mchog tu bya ba'i spos dang bdug spos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog mtha' yas pa dang / dri zhim por btul ba'i mchod pa can/ lha la mchog tu bya ba'i lhab lhub kyi rgyud bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par klubs shing dag par byas pa/ rin po che'i me tog gi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che'i thams cad kyi rgyud du mdzas par byas pa/ dpal gyi snying po'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che sna tshogs su brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan du rnam par dag pa/ nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus gdan gyi snying po shin tu brgyan pa/ dbang po'i rdo rje bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu spras pa/ rin po che'i snam bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun tu sbyangs pa/ 'jig rten mtha' yas pa'i dbang po'i nor bu rin po che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu bzang bar brgyan pa/ gser gyi snying po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu bsgrubs shing dag par byas pa/
nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rdul med par snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che brgya byin mngon par chags pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po mtha' yas par snang bar brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che dpa' pa'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu 'bar bar bsgrubs pa/

A hundred trillion curtains of all jewels, adorned by huge wish-fulfilling gems, and a hundred trillion flowers of exquisite jewels surrounded in glorious arrays. A hundred trillion reflecting hangings, of superb beauty, were placed at intervals. A hundred trillion garlands of jewels and a hundred trillion garlands of fragrances hung down on all four sides. A hundred trillion celestial fragrant resins perfumed everywhere. A hundred trillion ornaments of celestial decorations, a hundred trillion ornaments of jewel flowers, a hundred trillion ornaments of jewels from the finest mines, a hundred trillion ornaments of wish-fulfilling jewels, and a hundred trillion ornaments of wish-fulfilling pearls from the ocean, adorned the body of the throne. A hundred trillion embroidered tapestries of exquisite jewels trailed down like streamers. A hundred trillion cosmic nets of diamonds, a hundred trillion wish-fulfilling jewels, and a hundred trillion beautiful gold treasure troves were placed at intervals as embellishments.

nor bu rin po che snang ba'i 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'od zer snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che lha la mchog tu bya ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus skar khung gi shar bu mdzes par bres pa/ nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyis dag pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog gsal bar gyur pa/ dngul gyi rta babs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bres pa'i snying po dkar po rab tu rnam par phye ba/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i zla gam bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sbubs shin tu bsgrubs pa/ nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus blta na mdzes par shin tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sems kyi rgyal po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'dab chags yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar kun tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che seng+ge'i gdong bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu spras pa'i mchod pa dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mthu brtan par shin tu brtan pa/ nor bu rin po che snying po dag pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par snang zhing mdzes par byas pa; nor bu rin po che dbang po'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snang ba'i gdugs su bres pa/ nor bu rin po che dngul gyi snying po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus nang rnam pa sna tshogs su bkram pa/ nor bu rin po che ri rab kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po shin tu brgyan pa/

A hundred trillion luminous jewels and a hundred trillion sapphires blazing with light and a hundred trillion indestructible celestial gems formed the windows: a hundred trillion jewels of pure qualities, giving forth sublime colors, and a hundred trillion jewels from pure beautiful mines formed the doorways. A hundred trillion crescent jewels, finest in the world, a hundred trillion mind-king wish-fulfilling jewels, a hundred trillion rose gold jewels, a hundred trillion jewels from pure troves, and a hundred trillion jewels symbolic of sovereignty, all radiating light, covered the top. A hundred trillion jewels set in pure silver and a hundred trillion jewels emblematic of the polar mountain adorned its lotus blossom bank.

mu tig gi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog mdzes par bres pa/ bai DUr+ya'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dra bar bres pa/ mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par phye ba/ nor bu yid du 'ong ba'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rnam par sna tshogs su bkod pa/ rin po che shin tu snang ba'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu rnam par bye zhing rab tu bzung ba/ rin po che 'bru sna tshogs kyi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lus shin tu brgyan pa/ mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong bar snang ba/ nor bu rin po che kha dog du ma'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po kha dog sna tshogs shing kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mthar phyin pa/ dga' bar byed pa'i phreng ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus dag par sbyangs pa/ nor bu rin po che dpal gyi 'od zer gyi phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dpal chen po rab tu thob pa thob par gyur pa/ nor bu'i gzugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus phyogs shin tu spa bar brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dbang po'i 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu la gnas yongs su 'dzin pa/ dus dang mthun pa'i tsan+dan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dri zhim pos rgyas par byas pa; rim gro byed pa'i mi'i tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rjes su song ba/ spos kyi thum po shin tu che ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu rgyas pa; ; gzhan gyis pham pa med pa'i spos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dri kun tu rgyas pa/ spos kyi gzugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dri kun tu 'byung ba/ yid du 'ong ba'i spos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dri rab tu 'byung ba/ snang ba ston pa'i spos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dris 'gro ba kun tu gang ba/ dri sna tshogs kha dog mtha' yas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du phyir mi ldog par zhim pa/ byug pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu byugs pa/ tsan+dan rnam pa tha dad pa'i spos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus tshon du bskus shing mdzes pa/ spos rnam pa tha dad pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dri zhim por shin tu bsgos pa/ a ga ru nag po pad+mo'i snying po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sprin gyi snying por byas pa/ bdug spos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu bdugs shing yog pa/ bdug spos kyi 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu dbang po zhi bar zhim pa; spos kun tu rgyu ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yid du 'ong bar zhim pa/ spos kyi 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus ro thams cad du bdugs shing dri zhim pa/ spos rnam par tshor bar byed pa'i dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dbang po mi 'khrug par spos thams cad kyis mchod par byas pa/ spos kyi rgyal po gzhal du med pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spos kyi gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs su shin tu brgyan pa/

A hundred trillion pearl ornaments, a hundred trillion lapis lazuli ornaments, a hundred trillion ruby ornaments, a hundred trillion wish-fulfilling jewel ornaments, a hundred trillion ornaments of jewel lights, a hundred trillion ornaments of jewels of various mines, a hundred trillion red pearls, extremely pleasing to the sight, a hundred trillion ornaments of jewels from treasuries of boundless colors and forms, a hundred trillion ornaments of incomparable jewels of extreme purity, and a hundred trillion ornaments of jewels of superlative brilliance were hung all around as adornments.
A hundred trillion unusually beautiful decorations made of jewels, a hundred trillion jewels in the exquisite forms of celestial beings, a hundred trillion subtle perfumes from the ten directions, a hundred trillion black sandalwood incenses, a hundred trillion fragrances from inconceivable realms, a hundred trillion most excellent scents, and a hundred trillion extremely pleasing incenses all emitted fragrant airs, perfuming the ten directions. A hundred trillion special incenses were scattered in all ten directions; a hundred trillion scents of pure light perfumed sentient beings; a hundred trillion incenses of boundless various colors perfumed all the buddha-lands, never fading away; a hundred trillion perfumes, a hundred trillion scents, a hundred trillion burning incenses perfumed everything. A hundred trillion aloe perfumes from lotus blossom banks producing great sound, a hundred trillion wafting fragrances with the power to transform the minds of sentient beings, and a hundred trillion perfumes with the power to enlighten pervaded everywhere, causing all the senses of those who noticed them to become dispassionate and tranquil. There were also a hundred trillion various arrays of peerless perfumes, kings among fragrances.

lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi phye ma'i sprin bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi pad+mo'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i me tog gi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i char mngon par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi ut+pa la'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun tu yog par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i me tog gi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi me tog puN+Da rI ka'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi me tog man+dA ra ba'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i tshogs chen po rab tu 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi me tog thams cad kyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rgyun du 'bab pa/ na bza'i sprin bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bar snang kha dog sna tshogs su gyur pa/ nor bu rin po che'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun tu snang bar 'bab pa/ gdugs kyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas yog par 'bab pa; ba dan gyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kha dog sna tshogs du mar 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi cod pan gyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sna tshogs su 'bab pa/ lhab lhub kyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu klubs par 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kha dog sna tshogs su 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sen mo do'i sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rgyan chen por 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan gyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu tsan+dan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi kha dog du mar 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi a ga ru dang / tsan+dan gyi sprin gyi char bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu yog par 'thul zhing 'bab pa/

There rained a hundred trillion clouds of celestial flowers, a hundred trillion clouds of celestial perfumes, a hundred trillion clouds of heavenly incense powders, a hundred trillion clouds of celestial blue lotuses, a hundred trillion clouds of celestial red lotuses, a hundred trillion clouds of heavenly white lotuses, a hundred trillion clouds of heavenly mandarava flowers, a hundred trillion clouds of all kinds of celestial flowers, a hundred trillion clouds of celestial garments, a hundred trillion clouds of jewels, a hundred trillion clouds of celestial canopies, a hundred trillion clouds of celestial banners, a hundred trillion clouds of celestial crowns, a hundred trillion clouds of celestial ornaments, a hundred trillion clouds of celestial garlands, a hundred trillion clouds of necklaces of heavenly jewels, a hundred trillion clouds of celestial sandalwood incense, and a hundred trillion clouds of celestial aloe incense.

rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu bsgrengs pa/ rin po che'i ba dan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu dbyangs pa/ snam bu rin po che'i lda ldi bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu bres pa/ spos kyi snod bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu nas shin tu 'thul ba/ rin po che'i phreng ba'i chun po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu dbyangs pa/ rin po che'i sil snyan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu 'khrol zhing 'dzin pa/ lha rdzas kyi rdul yab bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rnam par rlob cing 'dzin pa/ rin po che'i dril bu'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu 'khrol ba/ rin po che'i stegs bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i shing ta la'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas 'greng ba/ rin po che'i phreng ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lda ldir brgyan pa/ rin po che'i shing bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas yog cing 'khor ba/ khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i rgyan can bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus nang gi rgyan du dkrigs pa/ rin po che'i khang bu bye ba brgya stong gi sgo la rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba bkye ba/ gser gyi dril bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong bar 'byung ba/ dpal gyi be'u bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i phreng ba rab tu dbyangs pas yongs su dag pa/ rin po che'i bkra shis bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i mtshan bzang po byung ba/ gser gyi dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i gser gyi lcag bod kyis kun tu bltas pa/ rin po che'i gdugs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rin po che thams cad kyi yu bas bzung ba/ rin po che'i rgyan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che'i rgyan gyi dra ba thams cad du rnam par bres pa/

There were set up a hundred trillion jewel banners, there were hung a hundred trillion jewel pennants, there were draped a hundred trillion jewel streamers, there were lit a hundred trillion incense braziers, there were spread a hundred trillion jewel garlands, there were held a hundred trillion jewel fans, there were taken up a hundred trillion gold whisks, there were draped a hundred trillion nets of jewel chimes producing exquisite sounds when stirred by the breeze. A hundred trillion jewel balustrades surrounded the throne, a hundred trillion jewel palm trees were arrayed in rows. A hundred trillion windows framed with gorgeous gems made magnificent adornments. A hundred trillion jewel trees provided shade all around. A hundred trillion jewel turrets adorned north to south and east to west. A hundred trillion jeweled doorways were draped with garlands. A hundred trillion golden chimes produced sublime music. A hundred trillion ornaments in the form of auspicious symbols were draped in splendid arrays. There were a hundred trillion jewel talismans able to get rid of all evils, a hundred trillion gold treasuries woven of golden thread, a hundred trillion jewel umbrellas with handles of precious elements held in rows, and a hundred trillion nets of all kinds of precious ornaments arrayed at intervals.

rin po che'i 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'od zer sna tshogs su rab tu 'phro ba/ snang ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kun tu snang bar byed pa/ 'od bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu 'tsher ba/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi snying po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus gzugs rab tu mdzes shing lus shin tu 'phags pa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog du mar bsgrubs pa/ spos kyi 'od zer bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab rib med par snang ba/ lha rdzas kyi pad+mo'i dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu bsgrubs shing snying po shin tu 'phags pa/ rin po che'i dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po kun nas yog par byas pa/ me tog gi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas rgyas par bkram pa/ spos kyi dra ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i dri sna tshogs kyis kun nas yog pa/ lha rdzas kyi gdan rin po che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mdzes par bting ba/

A hundred trillion luminous jewels radiated various kinds of light; a hundred trillion light beams illumined everywhere. There were a hundred trillion sun-treasury orbs and a hundred trillion moon-treasury orbs, all made of collections of jewels of infinite colors. A hundred trillion fragrant flames shone with crystal clear light. A hundred trillion banks of lotuses burst into glorious bloom. A hundred trillion nets of jewels, a hundred trillion nets of flowers, and a hundred trillion nets of incenses covered above.

lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mdzes par bkram pa/ lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog sngon po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu brgyan par bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog ser bo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rgyan chen por bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog dmar po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu lha'i dga' bar bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu gos kyi rgyan du bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi gos rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kha dog legs par bting ba/ spos sna tshogs kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i gos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu gos bzang por bting ba/ rin po che rmad du byung ba thams cad kyi gos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan du bting ba/ gos dkar po sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bla gab tu bkab pa/

A hundred trillion jewel robes, a hundred trillion sapphire robes, a hundred trillion celestial yellow robes, a hundred trillion celestial red robes, a hundred trillion celestial robes of unusual colors, a hundred trillion extraordinary celestial robes of various precious substances, a hundred trillion various perfumed robes, a hundred trillion robes made of all precious substances, and a hundred trillion pure white robes, were all carefully spread, delightful to all observers.

lha rdzas kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i sgra phyung ba/ gser gyi dra ba'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sgra shin tu 'byin cing yongs su bzung ba/ lha rdzas kyi snam bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rgyal mtshan gyi dra ba'i rgyan du brgyan pa/ spos kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spos kyi dra ba thams cad kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu me tog thams cad kyi char du 'bab pa/ lha rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus gos thams cad du bskyod pa/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mdzes pa thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang ldan par byas pa; lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lhab lhub thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur pa/ lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu phyogs kun nas 'greng ba/ lha rdzas kyi gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu dril bu thams cad 'khrol bas yid du 'ong zhing dga' ba'i sgra phyung ba;

A hundred trillion banners of celestial chimes and a hundred trillion banners of golden mesh produced subtle tones. There were a hundred trillion banners of heavenly embroideries, containing all colors. A hundred trillion fragrant banners were draped with webs of perfume. A hundred trillion flower banners showered all kinds of flowers. A hundred trillion banners of raiment trailed exquisite robes. There were a hundred trillion celestial jewel banners, studded with all sorts of gems, a hundred trillion celestial ornament banners, decorated with all manner of embellishments, a hundred trillion celestial garland banners, garlands of various kinds of flowers arrayed on four sides, a hundred trillion celestial canopy banners, with jewel bells harmoniously ringing, pleasing all hearers.

lha rdzas kyi dung bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sgra snyan pa phyung ba/ lha rdzas kyi rnga bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnga chen po'i sgra shin tu phyung ba/ lha rdzas kyi pi wang bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong zhing 'brel ba'i sgra phyung ba/ lha rdzas kyi kha sbyar bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dbyangs chen por sgra bsgrags pa/ lha rdzas kyi sil snyan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu glu dang rol mor sbyar ba dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo dbyangs kyi dam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sgra yid du 'ong bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par grags par byas pa/ sprul pa'i rol mo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sgra brnyan gyi tshogs lta bur shes par byas pa/ lha rdzas kyi rnga bo che bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu brdungs pa'i sgra phyung ba/ yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lha rdzas kyi rol mo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ong ba dang glu'i dbyangs snyan pa phyung ba/ lha rdzas kyi rol mor gtogs pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid dga' ba dang zhi ba'i sgra phyung ba/

There were a hundred trillion celestial conches producing wonderful sounds, a hundred trillion celestial bass drums producing great booms, a hundred trillion celestial pipes producing subtle sounds, a hundred trillion celestial drums producing loud beautiful sounds, a hundred trillion orchestras playing all at once, a hundred trillion independent celestial musicians producing sublime sounds filling all buddha-lands, a hundred trillion celestial magical music sounding like echoes, responding to all things, a hundred trillion celestial drums producing wonderful sounds when struck, a hundred trillion kinds of miraculous celestial music which produced spontaneous harmony, and a hundred trillion various celestial assemblies producing wonderful music extinguishing all afflictions.

tshig gi rim pa yid du 'ong ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bstod cing mchod pa/ bstod pa rgya chen po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dga' bar bstod cing mchod pa/ zab mor bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu bsgoms shing bstod pa/ bstod pa sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus las thams cad kyi rnam par smin pa las yongs su byung bar bstod pa/ phra bar bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstod pa/ sngon gyi spyod pas bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par brjod de 'das pas bstod pa/ dge ba'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus brtan cing bstod pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par dag par bstod pa/ chos kyi sgo'i bstod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par byung bar bstod cing 'jigs pa med par bstod pa/ bstod pa rnam pa tha dad pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi zad par brjod cing bsngags te bstod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad glur brjod cing sbyar ba/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thogs pa med par bstod pa/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu glu'i dbyangs su blangs pa/ chos zab mo'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thogs pa med par chos kyi snang ba thams cad glu blangs te sbyar ba/ dbyangs rgya chen po'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yid du 'ong ba'i sgrar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bsgrags pa/ sems dang bsam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu thogs pa med par glur blangs shing rna ba dang bar byas pa/ khams gsum du gtogs pa'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rnam par bstan pa/ dga' bar byed pa'i glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu thogs pa med pas dad pa dang rim gro rab tu bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos kyi don thams cad gsal bar brjod cing sgra phyung ba/ gzungs kyi glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi ldem po dag rab tu rtogs par rnam par ston pa/ chos thams cad kyi glu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus chos thams cad kyi glu dang / rol mo dang / sil snyan gyi sgra phyung ba dang ldan pa/

A hundred trillion pleasing sounds sang praises of giving offerings; a hundred trillion far-reaching sounds sang praises of service; a hundred trillion extremely deep sounds sang praises of practical application; a hundred trillion sounds of myriad subtleties sang praises of the fruits of the Buddhas’ deeds; a hundred trillion delicate sounds sang praises of principles in accord with reality; a hundred trillion unimpeded sounds of truth sang praises of Buddha’s past practices; a hundred trillion pure sounds sang praises of past offerings to the Buddhas; a hundred trillion sounds of teachings sang praises of the supreme fearlessness of the Buddhas; a hundred trillion infinite sounds sang praises of the infinity of enlightening beings’ virtues; a hundred trillion sounds of the stages of enlightening beings sang praises of revealing the practices appropriate to all the stages of enlightening; a hundred trillion uninterrupted sounds sang praises of the endlessness of the Buddha’s virtues; a hundred trillion conformative sounds sang praises of practices by which Buddha is seen; a hundred trillion sounds of extremely profound teaching sang praises of principles corresponding to unhindered knowledge of all things. A hundred trillion great sounds filled all buddhalands; a hundred trillion sounds of unimpeded purity caused all to rejoice in accord with their inclinations; a hundred trillion sounds of nondwelling in the triple world caused all hearers to enter deeply into the nature of reality; a hundred trillion sounds of joy caused the minds of all hearers to be unobstructed, with deep faith and respect; a hundred trillion sounds of the realm of buddhahood revealed the meanings of all things; a hundred trillion sounds of concentration formulae expounded the distinctions of all doctrines, definitively comprehending the esoteric treasury of the Enlightened Ones; a hundred trillion sounds of all truths, gentle and pleasant, harmonized all the music.

byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu la thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyi stobs dang shugs mthong ma thag tu skye bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sems dga' zhing mos par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor la spyod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i mos pa rnam par sbyong ba; byang chub sems dpa' cher skyes pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i theg pa chen po brtsams pa rgya cher byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba dang ldan pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i theg pa chen po brtsams pa yongs su rgyas par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang ldan pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad shin tu sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gzhal du med pa ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong thob par rnam par 'phrul ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sgrub cing sbyong pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu skyes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mi shigs par rab tu gzhog pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i shugs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu dga' ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i chos kyi grags pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi don bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i ye shes gdon mi za ba nges par ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dran pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'khrug pa med par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i blo gros bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i ye shes gdon mi za ba skyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rigs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'dzin par byin gyis rlob pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i blo gros bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yangs pa'i blo tshad med par ston pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rtsa ba brtan par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu gtong ba thams cad sbyin pas rnam par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu tshad med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par sgrub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sems 'khrug pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bzod par 'jug pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mtha' yas pa'i brtson 'grus su 'byung bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu tshad med pa'i bsam gtan rtogs pa'i snang bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu shin tu snang zhing shes par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i 'byung ba rnam par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sgo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i ye shes snang ba gsal bar byed pa/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 'byams klas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i chos kyi sgo snang ba byin gyis rlob pa/ phyogs bcu 'byams klas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i chos kyi tshul rmongs pa med cing gti mug med par smon pa/ chos kyi 'byung gnas bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu thob par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu 'byams klas pa la 'jug par byed pa/ chos kyi lus bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro bar byed pa; de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par sgrub pa rab tu shes pa byed pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshul bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par sgrub pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa/ chos 'byams klas pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i tshogs rab tu sgrub pa/ chos kyi ye shes bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mthong ba la rgyal mtshan du gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yang dag par ston pa'i spyod yul can/

There were a hundred trillion newly inspired enlightening beings who, as soon as they saw this throne, doubly increased their determination for omniscience; a hundred trillion enlightening beings preparing the ground, their minds pure and joyful; a hundred trillion practicing enlightening beings, their understanding pure and clear; a hundred trillion nobly born enlightening beings, abiding in supreme zeal; a hundred trillion enlightening beings equipped with skill in means, activating the great vehicle; a hundred trillion enlightening beings in the abode of right mindfulness, diligently cultivating the path of all enlightening beings; a hundred trillion nonregressing enlightening beings, purifying all stages of enlightenment; a hundred trillion enlightening beings of youthful nature, attaining the light of concentration of all enlightening beings; a hundred trillion prince of teaching enlightening beings, entering the inconceivable sphere of all Buddhas; a hundred trillion coronated enlightening beings, able to manifest the ten powers of infinite enlightened ones; a hundred trillion enlightening beings with mastery of spiritual powers; a hundred trillion enlightening beings with pure understanding; a hundred trillion enlightening beings with determined minds; a hundred trillion enlightening beings with profound, unbreakable faith; a hundred trillion enlightening beings expounding the meanings of the teachings, causing knowledge to be sure; a hundred trillion enlightening beings with undisturbed correct recollection; a hundred trillion enlightening beings of certain knowledge; a hundred trillion enlightening beings with the power to retain what they hear, holding all the Buddha teachings; a hundred trillion enlightening beings producing infinitely vast great awareness and understanding; a hundred trillion enlightening beings abiding in the faculty of faith; a hundred trillion enlightening beings who had attained transcendent self-control and fully kept all the moral precepts; a hundred trillion enlightening beings who had attained transcendent generosity and were able to give everything; a hundred trillion enlightening beings who had attained transcendent forbearance whose minds did not wander and who were able to accept all the Buddha teachings; a hundred trillion enlightening beings who had attained transcendent vigor and were capable of carrying out infinite efforts for emancipation; a hundred trillion enlightening beings who had attained transcendent meditation and were imbued with the shining light of infinite meditations; a hundred trillion enlightening beings who had attained transcendent wisdom, the light of their wisdom able to illumine everywhere; a hundred trillion enlightening beings who had perfected great vows, all pure; a hundred trillion enlightening beings who had attained the lamp of knowledge, clearly illumining the teachings; a hundred trillion enlightening beings illuminated by the light of truth of the Buddhas of the ten directions; a hundred trillion enlightening beings expounding the way to get rid of folly throughout the ten directions; a hundred trillion enlightening beings who entered the fields of all Buddhas; a hundred trillion enlightening beings whose body of reality reached all buddha-lands; a hundred trillion enlightening beings who had attained the voice of Buddhas and were capable of enlightening many; a hundred trillion enlightening beings who had attained the means of producing all knowledge; a hundred trillion enlightening beings who had accomplished all aspects of the teaching; a hundred trillion enlightening beings who had attained true knowledge, like jewel banners, able to make plain all Buddha teachings; and a hundred trillion enlightening beings able to fully reveal the realm of enlightenment.

lha'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par dga' ba'i lus can/ klu'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mi skyo bar lta ba/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu thal mo sbyor zhing spyi bo la bzhag pa/ dri za'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mi ngoms par mos pas ldang ba/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu nga rgyal gyi yid yongs su chud pa/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i kha nas dar shin tu dbyangs pa/ mi'am ci'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu sems rab tu dga' ba/ lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dga' ba'i yid du blta ba/ tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu zhes sa phu dud du gnas pa/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bo dang lus kyis btud pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu blta ba/ rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dga' ba chen po'i sgra phyung ba/ rab dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rab tu btud pa/ rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus phyag bya ba/ dbang byed kyi lha'i rgyal po la sogs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus thal mo sbyar ba/ tshangs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus blta ba; dbang phyug chen po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par brjod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par bstod pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu mchod pa/ smon lam gyi lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu mngon par dga' ba/ sngon 'grogs pa'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sgra phyung ba/ tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lus thams cad kyi phyag bya ba/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bos 'dud pa/ tshangs pa kun ris kyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus bskor ba byas pa/ tshangs pa chen po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yon tan mtha' yas pa'i mthar phyin pa brgya phrag stong gis shin tu bstod pa'i sgra phyung ba/ kun snang dang ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus 'khor lngas phyag bya ba/ 'od chung gi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas skye ba shin tu dkon pa'i sgra bsgrags pa/ tshad med 'od kyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas legs par gshegs so/ / zhes phyag bya ba/ kun snang dang ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu bstod cing mngon par dga' ba'i sgra phyung ba/ dge ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus gzhal med khang dang ba can du 'phags pa/ 'od chung gi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sems dang ba'i lus kyis mngon par 'dud pa; tshad med dge ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas mthong bar mos shing rang gi lus kyis 'dud pa/ dge rgyas kyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba; che ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dge ba'i rtsa ba rjes su dran par bya ba/ chung che'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i 'du shes rab tu skyes shing blta ba/ tshad med che ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dge ba'i chos rtogs shing rim gro cher bya ba/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lus shin tu 'dud pa/ mi che ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dad pa'i rtsa ba brtan par byas te mngon par brjod cing lus 'dud pa/ mi dros pa'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyi spyan snga nas thal mo sbyar zhing ngom mi shes par blta ba/ gya nom snang ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par bltas te lus 'dud pa; shin tu mthong ba'i lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa la ngom mi shes par lus dbul ba/ 'og min gyi lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus spyi bos 'dud cing mchod pa/

A hundred trillion celestial kings of the various heavens prostrated themselves reverently; a hundred trillion naga kings gazed fixedly; a hundred trillion yaksha kings joined their palms above their heads; a hundred trillion gandharva kings developed pure minds of faith; a hundred trillion titan kings cut off their pride; a hundred trillion garuda kings held streamers in their mouths; a hundred trillion kinnara kings danced joyfully; a hundred trillion mahoraga kings gazed with delight; a hundred trillion world leaders bowed with respect; a hundred trillion kings of the heavens of thirty-three celestial realms gazed unblinking; a hundred trillion kings of the Suyama heavens joyfully sang praises; a hundred trillion kings of Tushita heavens prostrated their bodies; a hundred trillion kings of the heavens of enjoyment of emanations bowed their heads to the ground in respect; a hundred trillion kings of the heavens of command of others’ emanations joined their palms reverently; a hundred trillion kings of the Brahma heavens watched single-mindedly; a hundred trillion celestial kings of great power reverently made offerings; a hundred trillion enlightening beings sang eulogies aloud; a hundred trillion goddesses single-mindedly made offerings; a hundred trillion deities with the same aspirations danced with joy; a hundred trillion deities who had lived in the same place in antiquity sang hymns of praise with beautiful voices; a hundred trillion Brahma-body deities prostrated themselves in respect; a hundred trillion Brahma-assistant deities joined their palms at their crowns; a hundred trillion Brahma-group deities circled around as guardian attendants; a hundred trillion great Brahma deities sang eulogies of infinite virtues; a hundred trillion deities of the heavens of light threw themselves on the ground; a hundred trillion deities of the heavens of little light sang eulogies of the difficulty of meeting with an age when a Buddha is in the world; a hundred trillion deities of the heavens of infinite light bowed to the Buddha from afar; a hundred trillion deities of the heavens of light-sound sang of the rarity of getting to see a Buddha; a hundred trillion deities of the heavens of purity came here along with their mansions; a hundred trillion deities of the heavens of minor purity bowed their heads with pure hearts; a hundred trillion deities of the heavens of infinite purity descended, wishing to see the Buddha; a hundred trillion deities of the heavens of universal purity approached with reverence and respect and made offerings; a hundred trillion deities of the heavens of vastness reflected on past roots of goodness; a hundred trillion deities of the heavens of minor vastness contemplated the rarity of the enlightened; a hundred trillion deities of the heavens of infinite vastness, with sure respect, initiated all good actions; a hundred trillion deities of the heavens of vast results bowed reverently; a hundred trillion deities of the heavens of no troubles bowed respectfully, their faith firm and enduring; a hundred trillion deities of the heavens of no heat joined their palms and remembranced the Buddha tirelessly; a hundred trillion deities of the heavens of good sight bowed their heads to the ground; a hundred trillion deities of the heavens of good manifestation meditated constantly on honoring and serving the Buddhas; a hundred trillion deities of the heaven of the ultimate of form bowed reverently.

lha sna tshogs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus dga' ba chen pos snang ba'i sgra phyung ba/ lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu bsam zhing bsgrubs te brgyan pa; lha'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus sangs rgyas kyi gdan bsgrubs pa la byin gyi rlabs rgyun mi gcod pa/ lha'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu me tog thogs pa dang / spos thogs pa dang / phreng ba thogs pa dang / phye ma thogs pa dang / byug pa thogs pa dang / na bza' thogs pa dang / gdugs thogs pa dang / rgyal mtshan thogs pa dang / ba dan thogs pa dang / rin po che thogs pa dang / phyang phrul thogs pa dang / lhab lhub thogs pas mngon par gtor zhing char du phab ste rab tu dgye ba/ lha bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lha'i khyim mngon par 'phags pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i pha rol tu phyin par bya ba/

A hundred trillion deities of various heavens sang praises with great joy; a hundred trillion deities each carefully considered and made adornments; a hundred trillion enlightening deities guarded the Buddha’s throne, ceaselessly embellishing it; a hundred trillion flower-bearing enlightening beings showered all kinds of flowers; a hundred trillion incense-bearing enlightening beings showered all kinds of fragrances; a hundred trillion garland-bearing enlightening beings showered all kinds of garlands; a hundred trillion elightening beings bearing powdered incense showered all kinds of powdered incenses; a hundred trillion perfume-bearing enlightening beings showered all kinds of perfumes; a hundred trillion raiment-bearing enlightening beings showered all kinds of raiment; a hundred trillion parasol-bearing enlightening beings showered all kinds of parasols; a hundred trillion banner-bearing deities showered all kinds of banners; a hundred trillion pennant-bearing enlightening beings showered all kinds of pennants; a hundred trillion gem-bearing enlightening beings showered all kinds of jewels; a hundred trillion ornament-bearing enlightening beings showered all kinds of ornaments.

lha'i gzhal med khang bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i lha'i bus dad par bsu ba/ lha'i bu btsun pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lhun shin tu bzung ba/ dbang bskur ba'i lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus lhun kun nas bzung ba/

A hundred trillion godlings came forth from their celestial palaces to the site of the throne; a hundred trillion godlings with pure faithful minds came with their palaces; a hundred trillion nobly born godlings supported the throne with their bodies; a hundred trillion consecrated godlings held the throne with their whole bodies.

byang chub sems dpa'i sems bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu legs par sems shing spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' btsun pa'i sems bskyed pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu'i yid dga' bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu sim par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yongs su dag par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rnam par dag par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yang dag par sbyong ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyes pa'i rabs bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu ston par byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sgo bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu snang bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu rab tu sgrub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ris bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu yongs su smin par 'dul pa/

A hundred trillion meditating enlightening beings contemplated respectfully; a hundred trillion nobly born enlightening beings gave rise to purity of mind; a hundred trillion enlightening beings became joyful and blissful in all senses; a hundred trillion enlightening beings’ profound minds of faith were purified; a hundred trillion enlightening beings’ faith and resolve were purified; a hundred trillion enlightening beings’ actions were purified; a hundred trillion enlightening beings were enabled to take on birth freely; a hundred trillion enlightening beings glowed with the light of truth; a hundred trillion enlightening beings consummated the stages of enlightenment; a hundred trillion enlightening beings became well able to teach and influence all sentient beings.

dge ba'i rtsa ba bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yang dag par byung ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus byin gyis brlabs pa/ bsod nams bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yongs su grub pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yongs su sbyangs pa/ smon lam bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu dag par byas pa/ spyod pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus yang dag par skyes pa/ chos bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus nye bar brtan pa/ rnam par 'phrul pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus rjes su song ba/ yon tan bye ba brgya stong phrag bcus shin tu 'phags pa bshams so/ /

Born of a hundred trillion roots of goodness, protected by a hundred trillion Buddhas, perfected by a hundred trillion virtues, purified by a hundred trillion sublime aspirations, beautified by a hundred trillion great vows, produced by a hundred trillion good actions, stabilized by a hundred trillion virtuous qualities, made manifest by a hundred trillion spiritual powers, developed by a hundred trillion meritorious achievements, eulogized for a hundred trillion praiseworthy qualities —
bam po sum cu pa/

ji ltar gling bzhi pa chen po 'di'i dga' ldan gyi gnas su lha'i dbang po rab dga' ldan gyi khang pa nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan can du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan bting bar gyur pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gling bzhi pa chen po dag na'ang dga' ldan gyi gnas dag tu lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan gyi khang pa rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan can dag tu rgyan 'di lta bu dang / tshul 'di lta bu dang / dad pa 'di lta bu dang / mos pa 'di lta bu dang / dga' ba 'di lta bu dang / rab tu dga' ba 'di lta bu dang / zhes 'di lta bu dang / rim gro 'di lta bu dang / spro ba 'di lta bu dang / nye bar sems pa 'di lta bus de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan bting bar gyur to/ /

as in the world the king of the Tushita heaven reverently set up a throne like this for the Enlightened One, so did the kings of the Tushita heavens in all worlds likewise set up such thrones, with such adornments, with such ceremonies, with such faith, with such purity of mind, with such delight, with such joy, with such respect, with such appreciation of rarity, with such dancing, with such yearning — all were the same.

de nas lha'i dbang po rab dga' ldan gyis gdan bting nas zhe sa can gyi rim gro dang bcas par dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu dang lhan cig tu dong ste bcom ldan 'das bsus nas me tog yon tan grangs med ba'i sprin gyi char ni/ rab tu phab/ spos yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i char ni/ shin tu phab/ phreng ba yon tan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sprin ni/ rab tu bkye/ tsan+dan shin tu dag pa'i sprin yangs pa ni/ rab tu bkye/ gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char ni/ rab tu phab/ lha rdzas kyi gos rab tu phra ba'i sprin ni/ rab tu bkye/ rin po che yid du 'ong ba mtha' yas pa thams cad kyi sprin gyi char ni/ rab tu phab/ sems shin tu dang bas lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub dang / 'phyang phrul gyi sprin gyi char ni/ rab tu phab/ bdug spos rnam pa du ma'i sprin gyis ni/ kun tu bdugs/ lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang / a.a ga ru'i phye ma dang / spos dam pa thams cad kyi phye ma'i sprin gyi char ni/ rab tu phab/ lha'i bu mtha' yas pas kyang rang rang gi lus kyi sprin shin tu bkye/ dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i ris nas 'dus pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang sems shin tu dang bas zhes rab tu bskyed nas shin tu btud de phyag 'tshal to/ / lha'i bu mo grangs med pa dag kyang dga' zhing mos pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das la rab tu sems so/ / byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na spyod pa grangs med pa rnams kyang bar snang la gnas te sangs rgyas la mchod par brtson pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa'i mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do; ; rim gro byed do/ / phyag 'tshal lo/ /

Then the king of the Tushita heaven, having set up the throne for the Enlightened One, respectfully greeted the Buddha together with countless godlings of the Tushita heaven; with pure hearts they showered clouds of flowers of innumerable colors, clouds of incenses of inconceivable colors, clouds of garlands of various colors, vast clouds of pure sandalwood, clouds of innumerable various parasols, clouds of fine celestial raiment, clouds of boundless beautiful jewels, clouds of celestial ornaments, clouds of innumerable incenses of all kinds, and clouds of all kinds of sandalwood and aloe. When the godlings each produced these clouds from their bodies, a hundred trillion incalculable numbers of godlings of the Tushita heaven, as well as the other godlings in the assembly, were overjoyed and bowed reverently. Countless goddesses danced with joyful anticipation, gazing at the Enlightened One. In the Tushita palace a host of unspeakably many enlightening beings hovered in the air, and with diligence and single-mindedness produced offerings surpassing all the heavens and presented them to the Buddha, bowing respectfully, while countless forms of music played all at once.

de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rgyu mthun pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rol mo dkrol ba dang brdung ba'i tshogs grangs med pa yang sgra 'byin par gyur to/ / lha'i bu dga' ldan gyi gnas na 'khod pa dang / lha'i bu mo rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la ni/ blta/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba shin tu dkon par ni/ rjes su sems shing / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i chos can no/ / zhes yang dag par lta zhing / de logs su mngon par blta bar gyur to/ / dga' ldan gyi gnas na 'khod pa'i 'khor thams cad dang / lha bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa bcom ldan 'das bsu ba'i phyir rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi phur ma thogs thogs pa dang spos thams cad kyi phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyi phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi a.a ga ru thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi me tog thams cad kyi phye ma'i phur ma thogs thogs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog man+dA ra ba'i phur ma thogs thogs pa rnams kyang dong ste bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ / mngon par gtor to/ / rab tu gtor to/ /

At this point, because of the great spiritual power of the Buddha, because of the effluence of past roots of goodness, and because of his inconceivable mystic powers, all the gods and goddesses in the Tushita palace saw the Buddha from afar as though he were right before them. They all had the same thoughts: “The appearance of an Enlightened One in the world is rarely encountered—now we are getting to see an omniscient one, who has unimpeded true awareness of all things.” Thus thinking, thus observing, together with the other groups they all welcomed the Buddha, each heaping celestial robes with all kinds of flowers, fragrances, jewels, ornaments, heavenly sandalwood and aloe incense, celestial jewel incenses, flowers of all heavenly fragrances, and mandarava flowers from all the heavens, and spread them as offerings to the Buddha.

lha'i bu dga' ldan gyi gnas su gtogs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa rnams kyang bar snang la 'khod de/ ye shes kyi spyod yul la gzhol ba'i sems kyis spos dang / bdug pa'i sprin gyis bdugs pas bar snang brgyan par byas so/ / sangs rgyas la dga' zhing gzhol ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi me tog thams cad kyi sprin gyi char gyis rab tu brgyan pas bar snang brgyan par byas so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa la zhes cher bya ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi gdugs sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis bar snang g.yogs par byas te brgyan par byas so/ / sangs rgyas mchod par gzhol ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi phreng ba sna tshogs kyi sprin rab tu dgye bas bar snang brgyan par byas so/ / sangs rgyas las thos par mos pa'i sems kyis gser gyi dra ba grangs med pa las dril bu sna tshogs kyi dra ba 'khrol zhing sgra 'byin pas yog par byas te bar snang brgyan par byas so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa la yon gyi gnas dam pa yin par 'dzin pa'i sems kyis bla re grangs med pa las rin po che thams cad kyi sen mo do'i sprin lding zhing 'phrul pa'i rgyan gyis bar snang brgyan par byas so/ / sangs rgyas la dge bar 'dun pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang grangs med par lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdungs pa dang / dkrol ba thams cad kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba phyung bas bar snang brgyan par byas so/ / sangs rgyas skye ba shin tu dkon par dogs pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi na bza' kha dog sna tshogs pa'i sprin dang / na bza' mtshungs pa med pa'i sprin gyi char 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis bar snang brgyan par byas so/ / sangs rgyas la mos pa mtha' yas pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi cod pan grangs med pa'i sprin las cod pan gyi char chen po 'khor zhing 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis bar snang brgyan par byas so/ / sangs rgyas la yid bde ba skyes pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi rin po che kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa'i sprin las phreng ba sna tshogs kyi char rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis bar snang brgyan par byas so/ /

Hundreds of trillions of infinities of Tushita deities hovered in the air; all considering the Buddha the realm of wisdom and knowledge, they burnt all kinds of incenses, producing aromatic clouds, adorning the sky. Also, thinking of the Buddha with joy, they showered clouds of celestial flowers, adorning the sky. Also, thinking of the Buddha with respect, they showered clouds of celestial canopies, adorning the sky. Also, desirous of making offerings to the Buddha, they scattered clouds of all kinds of celestial garlands, adorning the sky. Also, engendering resolute faith in the Buddha, they cast countless nets of gold through the sky, with chimes of all kinds of jewels continuously producing beautiful tones. Also, considering the Buddha the supreme field of blessings, they adorned the sky with countless drapes and showered clouds of all kinds of jewelry endlessly. Also, conceiving profound faith in the Buddha, they adorned the sky with countless celestial mansions, playing all manner of celestial music, producing subtle, melodious tones. Also, considering how rare it is to meet a Buddha, they adorned the sky with clouds of celestial raiment of all kinds of colors, showering various incomparably beautiful robes. Also, their hearts leaping with boundless joy at the Buddha, they adorned the sky with countless celestial jewel crowns, raining countless celestial crowns forming great clouds. Also, conceiving great joy in regarding the Buddha, they adorned the sky with countless jewels of various colors, ceaselessly raining clouds of all kinds of jewelry.

lha'i bu bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa yang lha rdzas kyi me tog kha dog tha dad pa grangs med pa lag na thogs te/ me tog zad mi shes pa'i mdzod rab tu bkye nas bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/ / mos pa'i spos dri zhim po rnyed cing sangs rgyas la dad par gnas pas lha rdzas kyi spos dang / bdug pa kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs te bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/ / rgyan chen po sprul pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan gyi phye ma kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs te bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// dga' ba'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zham 'bring du 'brang zhing rin po che'i gdugs kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'gebs so/ / sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa la mos pa'i sems rnam par 'phel bas gos rin po che kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs te bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa'i lam gos kyis yog par byas so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya bar mos pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog can lag na thogs shing bcom ldan 'das kyi zham ring du 'dong ngo/ / sangs rgyas la dga' ba mtha' yas pa rnam par 'phel ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi lhab lhub dang / 'phyang phrul kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa lag na thogs te de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo/ / dad pa mi 'phrog pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi phreng ba grangs med pa lag na thogs te bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/ / mtshungs pa med pa'i dga' ba rnam par 'phel bas/ lha rdzas kyi ba dan rin po che kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa'i yang grangs med pa lag na thogs te bcom ldan 'das kyi drung na 'dzin to/ /

Hundreds of trillions of infinities of celestial beings, all conceiving pure faith in the Buddha, scattered countless heavenly flowers of various colors and burned various celestial incenses as offerings to the Buddha. Also, thinking of the Buddha as a magnificent miraculous appearance, they brought celestial sandalwood incenses of innumerable various colors and reverently scattered them before the Buddha. Also, their hearts leaping with joy in regarding the Buddha, they followed the Buddha holding countless precious celestial robes of various colors and spread them on the roads as offerings to the Buddha. Also, regarding the Buddha with purity of mind, they greeted the Buddha carrying countless banners of celestial jewels of various colors. Also, conceiving supreme joy at the thought of the Buddha, they brought countless celestial adornments of various colors to present to the Buddha. Also, engendering unbreakable faith in the Buddha, they brought countless garlands of celestial jewels to present to the Buddha. Also, incomparably joyful at the thought of the Buddha, they brought countless pennants of celestial jewels of various colors to offer to the Buddha. A hundred trillion infinities of celestial beings, with tamed, tranquil minds free from indulgence, brought countless celestial musical instruments of various forms producing sublime tones to present to the Buddha.

lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa yang zhi ba la rab tu gzhol zhing bag yod pa tshad med pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba kha dog sna tshogs grangs med pa lag na thogs te yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dbyangs phyung nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes par byed do/ / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa dga' ldan gyi gnas nas 'ongs pa rnams kyang lha rdzas las 'das pa'i mchod pa/ khams gsum las rnam par 'das pa/ dmigs pa'i chos las byung ba/ rjen pa'i dri med pa/ chags pa med pa'i sems tshim par byed pa/ chos kyi tshul zab mos mngon par grub pa/ blo tshad med par yangs pa las byung ba/ dad pa'i rtsa ba brtan pas rnam par spel ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / 'phrul pa grangs med pas mngon par bsgrubs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa yid kyi rang bzhin las byung ba/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i chos kyi sgo'i rgyas btab pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad kun nas yog par byas so/ / lha rdzas las 'das pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i me tog gi bla re sna tshogs kyis chos kyi dbyings kun nas khebs par byas so/ / lha rdzas las 'das pa mos pas rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul rgyas par 'gengs pa'i na bza' sna tshogs mngon par dgab pas chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/ / chags pa med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin rdo rje la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa mi skye ba'i chos las byung ba'i dril bu tshom bur bcad pa'i dra bas chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/ / chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa'i spos thams cad kyi mchog gi bdug pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pas chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bya ba'i sems kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi khri sangs rgyas kyi gdan du bting ba'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/ / sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa rang bzhin 'gag pa med pa'i sems kyis lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan yang dag par bsgrengs pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/ / rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid kyis bsam pa tshim pas lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi pho brang brgyan pas chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/ / mi gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba blang ba med pa las byung bas lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad+mos kun nas yog pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings brgyan par byas so/ / lha rdzas las 'das pa'i spos thams cad kyi mchog gi sprin gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bya ba dang / me tog kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / na bza' kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad kyi sprin dang / tsan+dan gyi dri zhim po mtha' yas par 'phro ba thams cad kyi sprin dang / lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi ngad kun tu ldang ba'i sprin dang / phreng ba yid du 'ong ba thams cad kyi sprin dang / lha rdzas las 'das pa'i lhab lhub rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi sprin dang /

A hundred trillion infinities of enlightening beings already living in the palace of the Tushita heaven, with offerings surpassing those of all the gods, produced by the teaching transcending the worlds of desire, form, and formlessness, produced by infinitely broad knowledge, developed by steadfast pure faith, produced by action free from afflictions, produced by the all-pervading unobstructed mind, produced by the profound principle of adaptable methodology, produced by inconceivable roots of goodness, perfected by countless displays of skill in means, revealed by the will to make offerings to the Buddha, stamped by the teaching of noncreation, made gifts of these offerings to the Buddha. They presented to the Buddha canopies of all precious substances born in the transcendent ways, drapes of all kinds of flowers born of pure understanding of the realm of all Buddhas, all kinds of garments born of acceptance of the nonorigination of things, all kinds of nets of chimes born of the unimpeded mind entering into the state of indestructibility, all kinds of solid fragrance born of the mind understanding all things are like apparitions, beautiful thrones of myriad precious substances of all Buddhas, born of the mind omnipresent at the thrones of Buddhas in all realms of enlightenment, banners of all jewels, born of the mind tirelessly make offerings to the Buddhas, palaces of all jewels, dwelt in by the Buddhas, born of the joyful mind that understands that all things are like dreams, clouds of lotus blossoms of all jewels, born of roots of goodness without attachment and uncreated roots of goodness, clouds of all solid incenses, clouds of boundless flowers of all colors, clouds of exquisite raiment of all various colors, clouds of infinite pure sandalwood incenses, clouds of precious canopies with all kinds of embellishments, clouds of all burning incenses, clouds of all kinds of beautiful garlands, clouds of all kinds of pure decorations, all filling the cosmos, going beyond all the heavens.

byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa rang gi lus gtong ba'i sprin dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod pa las 'das pas bstod cing bsngags pa'i brjod pa zad mi shes pa'i sprin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstod pas brjod pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bsngags pa'i chos ma log pa byung ba/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs mtha' dang dbus med pa las rgyu bas 'gro ba thams cad bde ba'i lam bstan pa dang / tshig rnam par 'byed pa brjod du med pa smos pas chos tshad med pa la gzhol ba'i gzungs kyi rgyud thams cad las byung ba'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa la mkhas pa/ mi zad pa dang mi 'jigs pas yid dga' bar gyur pa'i rim gro ngom mi shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par bstod pa/ tshig rnam par dbye zhing brjod pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag chos kyi dbyings kyi lus nam mkha'i khams rgyas par byed pa byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i yid kyi dbang pos mngon par bstod do/ /

Those enlightening beings each produced from their bodies unspeakable hundreds of trillions of infinities of enlightening beings, filling the space of the cosmos, their minds all equal to the Buddhas of all times; by means of development from the delusion-free teaching and strengthening by the power of infinite enlightened ones, they revealed to sentient beings the path of peace; equipped with unspeakably many meaningful expressions, they entered into the seeds of all concentration formulae containing infinite teachings, and produced inexhaustible treasuries of intellectual powers; their minds without fear, they conceived great joy, and with unspeakable infinities of points of truthful praise they tirelessly eulogized the Enlightened One.

lha'i ris gzhan dang gzhan nas 'dus pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su ston cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang dag par 'byung ba dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul yang dag par ston pa dang / sems can grangs med pa'i rgyud tshim par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan rnam par phye bas nam mkha'i khams thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par mdzad pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mtha' yas pa brtan par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul gzhal du med pa las byung ba/ tshig gi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rigs dang ldan pa thams cad kyis mngon par mos par bya ba/ sems can 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sku yangs pa rjes su khyab par gyur pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod pa thams cad rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan tshad med pa yang dag par ston pa/

Then all the celestial beings and all the enlightening beings saw the Buddha, the perfectly enlightened one, the inconceivable hero of humanity, his bodies infinite, uncountable, manifesting inconceivably many different varieties of mystical transfigurations, causing the minds of countless sentient beings to be full of joy, pervading all universes throughout space, adorned with the embellishments of buddhahood, causing all sentient beings to abide in roots of goodness, displaying infinite spiritual powers of the Buddhas, beyond all manners of speaking, admired and respected by all great enlightening beings, causing them all to rejoice in accord with what they need to be taught, abiding in the immense body of the Buddhas, all virtues and roots of goodness purified, most excellent in appearance, not to be outshone by anyone.

de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin las byung ba/ 'gro ba thams cad ma lus pa'i lus kyi rjes su bdal ba/ sku'i byin gyi rlabs las mtshams med pa/ yid tshad med pa yongs su mgu bar mdzad pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa mtha' dang dbus med pa 'byung ba brnyes pa/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs su byung ba/ khams dang / mos pa bgrang du med pa thams cad sbyong bar mdzad pa; byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ye shes mngon par sgrub pa la 'jug par mdzad pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang po rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa/ chos kyi sprin gyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad du yog par mdzad pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus par de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rlob pa/ sems can thams cad kyi rtog pa bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa/ mi gnas pa'i ye shes kyi rgyud kyis 'gro ba thams cad las 'phags pa/

The sphere of the Buddha’s knowledge was inexhaustible, born of incomparable concentration. His body was boundless, omnipresent in the bodies of all sentient beings. He caused great joy to infinite beings. He caused the lineage of omniscient ones to continue unbroken. Dwelling in the ultimate abode of the Buddhas, born in the family of the Buddhas of past, present, and future, he caused the faith of countless sentient beings to be purified, and caused the knowledge and wisdom of all enlightening beings to be perfected. All his senses were joyful. The clouds of his teaching covered all universes in space, teaching and taming without omission, fulfilling all sentient beings according to their mentalities, causing them to abide in nondiscriminatory knowledge. He was beyond all sentient beings.

ye shes kyi rnam pa thams cad brnyes pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs snang ba gzigs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin du yang dag par gzigs pa/ sems bskyed pa rgya chen po skye bar mdzad pa; 'gro ba thams cad kun tu bzang po thub pa med pa'i ye shes yang dag par rgyu bas byung ba/ 'gro ba dang / zhing thams cad du khyab pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du mi ldog par gshegs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rgyud brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yang dag par ston pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'khrul pa mi mnga' bar byin gyis rlob pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi tshig gi rnam pas yon tan mi zad pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par mdzad pa; 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med par khyab par mdzad pa/ byang chub kyi sems kyis ji ltar dam bcas pa'i sems can rim gror mdzad pa/ ji ltar brnyes pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa/ sems can ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du 'dul bar mdzad pa/ mos pa dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dag par mdzad pa/ gzugs kyi sku bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis rlob pa/

Having attained omniscience, he radiated a great light. Causing his roots of goodness of past ages to be clearly manifest, he inspired great determination in everyone and caused all sentient beings to abide in the indestructible knowledge of universal good. Abiding everywhere in all lands of sentient beings, born of the nonregressing true teaching, he dwelt in the totally impartial realm of reality. Clearly understanding what was appropriate to the minds of sentient beings, he manifested unspeakably many different buddha-bodies, beyond the power of worldly speech to extol, able to cause all to always think of the Buddha, filling the cosmos, liberating vast numbers of living beings. According to the aid they required, he bestowed the teaching on them, causing them to be pacified and their faith to be pure, manifesting inconceivable physical forms.
