phyogs dang zhing rnams mtha' yas kun bkang zhing / / de dag mgo dang mig dang lag pa dang / / sha dang rkang dang de bzhin rkang pa dang / / rang gi lus kyis kun bkang sbyin par bsngo/ /
de dag de ltar yongs su bsngo byas nas/ / sems can phan phyir yongs su dgrol sems kyis/ / mtha' dang dbus med bskal par spyod pa byed/ / 'gro ba kun nas de dag sems mi ldog /
de dag 'gro ba kun la phan pa'i phyir/ / legs par byas pa'i las kyis srid gsum gyi/ / 'gro pa ma lus thams cad ci nas kyang / / bde bar 'gyur zhing byang chub thob par bsngo/ /
de dag mnyam zhing mtshungs par yongs su bsngo/ / las rnams dag pa ji ltar yongs bsgrubs pa; ; de dag 'gro ba kun dang mnyam par bsngo/ / de dag smon lam 'ching bar 'gyur ba med/ /
'gro ba kun tu ci la'ang thogs med par/ / thams cad rjes su smon lam de dag 'gro/ / de dag 'gro la phan phyir bsngo byed kyang / / mkhas pa rnams la spros pa gang yang med/ /
'gro ba kun la de dag gnyis gyur cing / / sbyin pas 'phags te tshul khrims rnam dag la/ / brtson 'grus stobs kyis sems la bcings med pa/ / de dag smon lam phyir ldog med pa yin/ /
de dag bsngo ba'i pha rol phyin pa dag / chos kyi rgyud la blo gros gnyis mnyam pa/ / de dag don nges pha rol phyin bya'i phyir/ / rkang gnyis dbang po'i drung du ye shes rkang pas 'dong / /
de dag chos kyi rnga yi mthar phyin pas/ / rtag tu ye shes rnam pa'i snying po 'chang / / tshul bzhin chos la chags pa med par zhugs/ / de bas de dag yid la chags pa med/ /
chos la gnyis su byed pa med pa ste/ / gnyis su med par chos la mi byed do/ / gnyis med gnyis las yongs su grol bas na/ / 'gro ba kun gyi tshig lam thams cad shes/ /
de dag 'jig rten mnyam nyid khong du chud/ / sems dang sgra dang las rnams thams cad kyang / / sprul pa lta bur 'gro ba kun shes te/ / kun kyang las kyi rnam smin tshul du 'jug /
'jig rten ji snyed yod pa las rnams kyis/ / byin gyis brlabs yin phyogs rnams sgra kun kyang / / las kyi rnam par smin par 'jig rten 'di shes na/ / las rnams thams cad ma lus 'gag par 'gyur/ /
de dag 'gro ba kun dang mnyam nyid du/ / lus dang dag dang sems rnams mnyam nyid kyis/ / 'gro ba kun dang mnyam pa nyid phyir bsngo/ / mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhung tshul 'di 'dra'o/ /
yongs su spyod pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ / gzugs rnams sbyangs shing de yi las bsngo ba/ / skyes bu 'dul ba'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba/ / de 'drar 'gro kun bsod nams gter du bsngo/ /
de dag 'gro ba thams cad zil mnan cing / / brtson 'grus lus dang ldan par gyur pa rnams/ / skye rgu kun la phan par byed sems kyis/ / bsod nams rgya mtsho yongs su bsngo bar byed/ /
bdag gis bsod nams bsgrubs pa gang yod pa/ / de yis 'gro kun rtag tu rnam dag gyur/ / rgyal ba de dag ji ltar rnam dag pa/ / de ltar 'jig rten rnam dag ldan gyur cig /
mkhas shing don gyi tshul la shes gyur nas/ / ye shes mkhyen ldan chos rab bsngags gyur cing / / 'gro kun sangs rgyas ji bzhin gyur cig ces/ / dge ba de dag mnyam pa nyid du bsngo/ /
de dag chos rnams gsog tu 'jal byed de/ / 'gro ba thams cad stong par rnam rig nas/ / byed pa med cing byed po gang yang med/ / 'gro ba rnams kyi las kyang chung mi za/ /
chos rnams zhi zhing 'jig rten ma zhi bar/ / rtog med sems kyis de ltar 'jal byed cing / / 'jig rten de dag rnam par rtog shes kyang / / rnam par rtog cing yongs su bsngo mi byed/ /
bde gshegs skur bgrang lus dang ldan pa rnams/ / rgyal ba rnams kyi chos las skyes pa'i sras/ / de dag 'jig rten 'di la the tshom med/ / rgyal sras de dag de ltar yongs su bsngo/ /

The virtues of what enlightening beings do Are subtle, great, and most profound; Their practice of even one moment They can dedicate without bounds.
Enlightening beings’ accoutrements, Various, abundant, in limitless numbers— Prize elephants and horses, drawing carts, Clothing, rare goods, all especially fine,
Or their heads, eyes, hands, and feet, Or their bodies, flesh, bones, and marrow, They give to all in infinite worlds, Filling the ten directions.
The virtues they’ve cultivated for countless eons They dedicate, all, Wishing to rescue sentient beings, Never retreating from this determination.
Enlightening beings, to serve the living, Always practice supreme dedication, Causing all worlds to attain peace and happiness That everyone may attain the highest fruit.
Enlightening beings universally make impartial vows, And whatever pure works they have accumulated They dedicate to all living beings, Never giving up this great commitment.
Enlightening beings’ will power is unlimited and dauntless, Taking in all worlds, Thus dedicated to living beings With never any discrimination.
They vow that sentient beings’ knowledge be clear, Their generosity and self-control all pure, Diligent in cultivation, indefatigable: This great commitment they never give up.
Enlightening beings’ dedication reaches the other shore— They open the gates of the pure, sublime teaching; Their knowledge the same as the Buddha, They analyze the true meaning and attain the ultimate.
Enlightening beings are masters of verbal expression And various kinds of knowledge; They explain the teaching according to truth, without hindrance, And yet their minds are not attached to it.
They do not create duality in things, Nor do they create nonduality; They are free of duality and nonduality, Realizing they are just manners of speaking.
They know all worlds are equal, Being naught but the doings of mental talk; And sentient beings are phantoms, without reality, All results of conditions.
The various consequences in all worlds Are each different— All are made from the power of acts; If action is stopped, all come to an end.
Enlightening beings observe all worlds, Their words, deeds, and thoughts impartial; And they induce sentient beings to be impartial Like the peerless great sage.
Enlightening beings’ good works they dedicate all To the purification of beings; They’re fully endowed with virtue and skill in means, Same as the Supreme Tamer.
Enlightening beings aid all living creatures, Dedicating their whole ocean of virtues, Vowing to cause their light to go beyond the world And attain the body of intrepid power.
The virtues they cultivate They pray will purify the world, That the purity of sentient beings be like The incomparable purity of Buddha.
Enlightening beings are skilled in interpretation, And know the supreme teaching of the Buddhas; They equally dedicate all good works, Vowing to make all beings the same as Buddha.
Enlightening beings know all things are empty And all worlds have no existence; There is no creation and no creator, Yet the consequences of beings’ actions remain.
All things — null? not null? They divorce this dualistic discriminating mind; They know all notions are worldly views: Entering the absolute state, conceptualization ends.
Thus are true children of Buddha Born by transformation from the Enlightened One’s teaching; They can practice such dedication well To remove all the world’s confusion.
'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rjes su song ba zhes bya ba ste/ yongs su bsngo ba bdun pa'o/ /

kye rgyal ba'i sras dag / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba brgyad pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dkar po spyod pa la rab tu brtson pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ snying rje chen po shin tu gsal bar bya ba la rab tu zhugs pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa chen po rin po che rab tu thob pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad yid la bya ba la brtson pa/ chos dkar po thams cad yongs su bsngo ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi bsam pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dam pa bzang po mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa/ yon tan dang ye shes la rab tu brtson pa'i yid la byed pa can/ kha lo sgyur ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ye shes kyis yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul la mkhas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yang dag par sems dpa'i mig dang ldan pa/ ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa shin tu rgya che ba dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang shes bzhin can/ brtan zhing mi g.yo ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ rmongs pa med pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/ khong nas snying brtse ba dang ldan pa/ las la thub pa med pa/ ye shes la dmigs pa thams cad las phyir mi ldog pa/ theg pa chen po'i sems kyis dpa' ba/ 'gro ba thams cad bde bar bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu thob pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skyon med pa yang dag par gsog cing dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa nye bar sgrub pa dang / dmigs par byed pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / yongs su dag par byed pa dang / nan tan du byed pa dang / mngon par brtson par byed pa dang / yongs su spyod cing sems pa dang / yang dag par sbyong ba dang / rab tu ston pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba sgo rnam pa tha dad pa gzhan dang gzhan gyi mtshan nyid sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ dngos po gzhan dang gzhan las byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs su bkod par gyur pa/ yang dag par spyod pa du ma dang / brjod pa mtha' yas pa'i tshul gyis rnam par brtags pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs su yang dag par spyad cing tshad med par rnam par phye ba las byung ba/ stobs bcur 'gro ba'i sems kyi byin gyis brlabs pa de dag dmigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs la rab tu brtson pa/ gnyis su med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la tshul gyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/

“What is great enlightening beings’ dedication with the character of true thusness? Here enlightening beings’ correct mindfulness is clear and perfect, their mind is firm and stable, they get beyond confusion, and cultivate practice single-mindedly, their profound mind unstirring, accomplishing indestructible works, proceeding toward omniscience without ever regressing. They are determined to seek the Great Vehicle, bold and fearless; planting roots of virtue, they bring peace to the world, producing excellent roots of goodness and cultivating pure qualities. Their great compassion grows, their mind-treasure develops; they always remember the Buddhas and preserve the true teaching. Their belief in the path of enlightening beings is firm and enduring, they perfect immeasurable pure roots of goodness, diligently cultivating all virtues and knowledge. As spiritual guides they produce myriad good principles, dedicating their knowledge and skill in liberative means to the salvation of others.
“At such a time enlightening beings examine all roots of goodness—immeasurable, boundless—with the eye of wisdom: those roots of goodness, in the course of being cultivated and gathered, involve seeking conditions, preparing instruments, purification, orientation and involvement, concentration and effort, initiation and execution, clarification and understanding, refined examination, and explanation; thus all have various facets, various spheres, various characteristics, various phenomena, various proportions, various acts, various names, various distinctions, various productions, various practices—all the roots of goodness therein are established by the mind directed toward the vehicle of the ten powers, and are all dedicated solely to the knowledge of all means and sciences of liberation.

dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson pa rnams kyi chags pa med pa'i lus yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa rnams kyi chags pa med pa'i ngag yongs su dag par gyur cig / theg pa chen po la gnas pa'i spyod pa thob par bya ba'i phyir chags pa med pa'i sems yongs su grub par gyur cig / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir bsgribs pa med pa'i sems yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig / 'gro ba mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir sbyin pa chen po mtha' yas pa'i sems bskyed pa rab tu thob par gyur cig / zil gyis mi non pa'i sems rab tu 'thob pa'i phyir chos la dbang bsgyur ba'i sems kyis chos kyis snang ba thams cad ston par gyur cig / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i snang ba rab tu 'thob pa'i phyir ye shes kyi 'byung gnas dang mngon par shes pa thams cad rnam par dag par gyur cig / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rab tu 'thob pa'i phyir 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dran pa rnam par dag par gyur cig / ltos pa med par yongs su 'byung ba'i phyir 'khon med par gnas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig / stobs bcu'i ye shes la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad nye bar blangs pas khyab par bya ba rgyun chad pa med par gyur cig / gos pa med par 'jig rten gyi khams su gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyu ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par gyur cig / sems can mtha' yas pa gdul ba rgyun chad pa med par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gnas par bya bas mi skyo bar gyur cig / byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir bsam pa'i rang bzhin mtha' dang dbus med pa mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas par gyur cig / rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyogs su ye shes kyis 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rmongs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan par gyur cig / ye shes dang mngon par shes pa la dbang bsgyur bar bya ba'i phyir sems skad cig gis 'byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa thams cad yongs su rgyas par gyur cig / 'jig rten thams cad mthong ba rnam par dag pa rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i rang bzhin yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig / tha dad pa med pa'i ye shes dam pa 'thob pa'i phyir zhing gcig zhing thams cad du rjes su rtogs pa'i ye shes dang ldan par gyur cig / sems can brjod du med pa gdul zhing byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir zhing thams cad byin gyis rlob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad tshad med par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu mngon par mos par gyur cig / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ye shes kyi mthong ba dam pa 'thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs rab tu thob par gyur cig / ces
de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zhing gi rnam pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / 'gro ba thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / ye shes kyis rnam par spyad cing byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / ji ltar bdag gi phyir yongs su bsngo ba de ltar sems can thams cad kyi phyir yang yongs su bsngo ste/ 'di ltar sems can dmyal ba'i ngan song dgag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / byol song gi skye gnas kyi ngan song med par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan song rgyun gcad pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i las rgyun gcad pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / sems can thams cad sems mnyam pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / dgra thams cad dang mdza' ba thams cad bde ba thams cad la gzud pa'i ye shes rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / sems can thams cad mngon du gyur pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba yang dag par bstan pa rnam par dge bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / sems can gyi don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes rtogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / lhag pa'i bsam pa rdul med pa'i byang chub kyi sems dang ye shes tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / sems can thams cad bde ba'i lam bstan par mnyam du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ /

“The roots of virtue they dedicate in this way: they vow to attain complete, unobstructed action to carry out enlightening practices; they vow to attain pure unobstructed speech, to carry out enlightening practices; they vow to attain fully developed unobstructed mental action and abide in the Great Vehicle; they vow to attain complete, unobstructed minds and purely cultivate all practices of enlightening beings; they vow to develop minds of infinitely magnanimous generosity and provide for all sentient beings; they vow to master all the teachings and spread the light of the great teaching, which nothing can veil; they vow to arrive at the realm of universal knowledge, illumining the world with the will for enlightenment; they vow to always correctly remember the Buddhas of past, present, and future, always clearly picturing the Enlightened present before them; they vow to live by fully developed powerful aspiration and get away from all demons and enemies; they vow to attain stabilization in the ten powers of knowledge of Buddhas and teach all sentient beings ceaselessly; they vow to attain concentration and travel through the worlds without being affected by or attached to the worlds; they vow to live in the world unwearied and always edify and influence sentient beings; they vow to activate innumerable liberative techniques of thought and wisdom and accomplish the inconceivable path of enlightening beings; they vow to attain knowledge never confused in any place, able to distinguish all worlds; they vow to attain the power of knowledge of autonomous spiritual capabilities, able to purify all lands in a single instant; they vow to penetrate the intrinsic nature of things and see all worlds as pure; they vow to develop knowledge of nondifferentiation, entering all fields in one field; they vow to reveal all the adornments of all fields to edify and influence infinite sentient beings; they vow to show the boundless cosmos in a single buddha-field, and to do likewise in all buddha-fields; they vow to attain free psychic powers and spiritual knowledge and be able to travel to all buddha-lands.
“By means of roots of goodness great enlightening beings vow to accomplish the adornment of all buddha-lands; they vow to be able to pervade all worlds; they vow to accomplish contemplative investigation by knowledge. As they thus dedicate roots of goodness for themselves in this way, so also do they do so for all sentient beings; that is, they vow that all sentient beings become forever free from hells, animality, and ghosthood; they vow that all sentient beings get rid of all hindering actions; they vow that all sentient beings attain universal minds with impartial knowledge and wisdom; they vow that all sentient beings deal with opponents and friends impartially, causing them all to be secure and happy, their knowledge and wisdom pure; they vow that all sentient beings’ knowledge become fully complete, with pure light illuminating everywhere; they vow that all sentient beings’ wisdom from reflection be fully developed and that they understand the real truth; they vow that all sentient beings seek enlightenment with pure aspiration and attain immeasurable knowledge; they vow that all sentient beings will be able to reveal the abode of peace.

yang dag pa'i sems la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad la rnam par byang ba'i sprin gyi char dbab pa'i tshul dang / sems can thams cad la bsod nams kyi zhing du dmigs pa'i tshul dang / sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i yongs su bsngo bas srung ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bsgribs pa thams cad dang mi 'grogs bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / bsgribs pa med pa'i dbyings la gnas par yongs su bsngo'o/ / ye shes dang mngon par shes pa chags pa med pas sems can thams cad kyis ye shes mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / sems can thams cad kyis lus kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / sems can thams cad don yod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis phan 'dogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sdud pas 'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug ste sems can thams cad kyis sems sgrib pa med cing mi sgul ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yul dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa mthong ba'am/ bza' shing gi ra ba dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang / ljang ba dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang / me tog dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang / spos yid du 'ong ba dang / shing tog dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang / gos yid du 'ong ba dang / rin po che dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang / rgyan dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang / ldum ra dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang / grong khyer dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang / ljongs dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang / rgyal po'i gnas dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang / khams dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang / yul dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang / rgyal po'i srid dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang / dbang dga' dga' ltar bsgyur ba dang / phyogs dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang / 'khor dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dang / 'brog dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa dag mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang ye shes la brtson pa/ bsod nams dam pas byung ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba don du gnyer ba/ 'gro ba kun tu bag yod par spyod pa/ legs par bstan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la brtson pa/ rgya mtsho lta bu shin tu dben pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba zad mi shes pa thams cad dang ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi 'byung gnas dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mi dad pa la mkhas pas yongs su bsngo ba/ rnam pa mtha' yas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsngo ba mthong ba dang / rnam par spyod pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la sems pas dmigs pa/ chud mi za ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi tshad kyis klas par rgyun mi chad cing / de bzhin nyid dang mnyam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/ sems can thams cad chos nyid ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 'dzin pa'i chos nyid kyi ngang tshul can du gyur te sangs rgyas mthong ba'i dga' ba rab tu thob cing sems can grangs med pa thams cad de bzhin nyid dang mnyam par rnam par dag par gyur cig / ces de 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa mthong ba de dag thams cad sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur ba yongs su rdzogs pas mdangs dga' ba dang / zhing thams cad nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par dag pas mdangs dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bstan pas mdangs dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba rab tu thob pas mdangs dga' ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la zhe sdang med pa'i mig gis blta bas mdangs dga' ba dang / dngos po thams cad yid du 'thad pa mthong bas mdangs dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad yang dag par gzung ba rab tu thob pas mdangs dga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la chos kyi snang ba thams cad rab tu thob pas mdangs dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad la gtong ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa byed pas mdangs dga' ba dang / chos thams cad 'jigs pa med par sems can thams cad la rab tu ston pas mdangs dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad rab tu thob pas mdangs dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzungs 'dzin pas mdangs dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes mtha' yas pas rnam par spyad pas mdangs dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba yang dag par ston pas mdangs dga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis shin tu bstan pa yang dag par ston pas mdangs dga' ba dang / tshig gi rab tu phye ba thams cad la mkhas pas bstan pa yang dag par ston pas mdangs dga' ba dang / snying rje chen po rab tu thob pas mdangs dga' ba dang / byang chub tu sems skye ba gsar pa gsar pas dbang po dga' bar gyur te mdangs dga' ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs su chud pas mdangs dga' ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad 'dul ba rgyun mi chad pas mdangs dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spobs pa mi zad pas chos thams cad rab tu ston pas mdangs dga' ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams re re yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par gnas pas yongs su mi skyo zhing mdangs dga' ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas pa'i tshul la sgo mnyam pas 'jug pas mdangs dga' ba dang / rtsa ba med pa'i chos thams cad chags pa med pa'i tshul la rab tu 'jug pas mdangs dga' ba dang / 'dod chags med pa dang mnyam pa'i chos thams cad kyi sgrib pa yongs su spang ba'i phyir mi gnyis pa'i dbyings khong du chud pas mdangs dga' ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i chos thams cad la bden pa'i mtha' ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu 'jug pas mdangs dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rtsod pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pas mdangs dga' ba dang / bsam pa rdo rje'i snying po lta bus thams cad mkhyen pa'i brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs pas mdangs dga' ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la bar du gcod pa'i dgra rab tu gdul ba yongs su rdzogs pas mdangs dga' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad du khyab pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul gyi sgo mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yang dag par bstan pa yongs su rdzogs pas mdangs dga' bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi mas sems shin tu snang bar byas pa/ rmongs pa med pa'i chos la rab tu brtson pa/ ye shes kyi las la zhugs pa/ ye shes kyi sa la shin tu bslab pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par bkram pa/ yongs su bsngo ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gting rnyed pa/ ye shes kyi rigs pa dam pa la zhugs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa tha dad pa 'byams klas pa thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug pa dang ldan pa de 'jig rten thams cad du gnas med par 'gro ba'i sems dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad la mngon par chags pas mi gnas pa'i bsam pa dang / chos thams cad la rlom sems med pa'i yid la byed pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la nyams pa med pa'i ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang mi 'gal ba'i yongs su bsngo ba'i sgos dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bsags pa de dag thams cad chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal ba med cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid 'khrug par mi 'gyur ba dang / dus mnyam pa nyid la rnam par dpyad pa dang / sems can med par rtogs par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos rnam par dgod pa yang dag par brjod pa dang / don shes pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i sa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dpyad pa dang / ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor la yang dag par sems pa dang / bsam pa shin tu brtan pa yang dag par rdzogs par bya ba dang / las thams cad yang dag par bsags pa la 'jug pa dang / chos rnams kyi bden pa nyid yang dag par blta ba dang / chos thams cad kyi skyon med pa nyid dang / chos ji lta ba bzhin du sprul pa'i rgyud pa ldan pa la rab tu 'jug par bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dngos po med par khong du chud par bya ba dang; don thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs su 'byung ba la rnam par dpyod pa dang / brjod pa thams cad la gnas med par shin tu bsgrubs pa dang / gnas thams cad rkyen sna tshogs kyis byung ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes par bya ba dang / yongs su bsngo ba rnam par dben pa la rab tu dpyod pa dang; chos thams cad tshul gcig tu yang dag par blta ba dang / tshul mtha' yas pa'i chos thams cad dang 'gal ba med par bya ba dang / yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'grogs pas bsnyen pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsngo bas 'gro ba thams cad yang dag par gzung ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba khong du chud par byed cing yongs su bsngo ste; de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jigs pa med pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o/ / tshad med pa'i sems kyis sems can thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / bdag gir bya ba med pa'i sems kyis phyogs thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o; ; khyad par med pa'i sems kyis 'jig rten thams cad la yongs su bsngo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yul dang / spyod yul thams cad dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis gos pa med pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la yang dag par spyod pas yongs su bsngo'o/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'gro ba thams cad mi dmigs shing mi gnas pas yongs su bsngo'o/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba de thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i nan tan bstan pas yang dag par bskyed pas yongs su bsngo'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba de chos kyi 'byung gnas rnam par brtags pa med pa mngon par bsgrubs pas yongs su bsngo'o/ / dge ba'i rtsa ba de de bzhin nyid kyi sgo thams cad du 'gro zhing; mtha' dang dbus med par 'gro bas yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag chos thams cad kyi de kho na rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid kyi ngang tshul gang yin pa de'i ngang tshul du gyur par dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rang bzhin med pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thams cad mtshan nyid kyis yang dag par dmigs pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / chos nyid gang gis de bzhin nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid kyi yul gang yin pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul yul med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chud pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid gang la gzhog pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad kyi gnas su 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar rjes su song ba de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag phyi ma'i mthar gyur pa'i bskal pa'i rjes su 'brang zhing rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar tshad med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems nam mkha'i dbyings ltar tshad med par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid kyis gang du khyab pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sems gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji srid du ring bar gnas pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'jig rten thams cad dga' ba zad mi shes par gnas par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar rjes su 'gro ba de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos dpe med pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid kyi snying po gang yin pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal ba'i snying po dang ldan par yongs su bsngo'o; ; de bzhin nyid ji ltar mi shigs pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad mi mthun pa med par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid kyi snang ba gang yin pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad du snang bar yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar thams cad na yod pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad du 'gro bar yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar dus thams cad na yod pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dus thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar rnam pa thams cad la yod pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing rnam par dag par yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag spyod pa thams cad la thogs pa med par yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar chos thams cad la mig tu gyur pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad kyi mig tu gyur par yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar dub par 'gyur ba med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la dub pa med par yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar zab pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba zab mo nyid du yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar dngos po med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dngos po med pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar 'byung ba med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bstan du med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar rab rib med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag rab rib med pa'i mig thob par yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar 'dra ba med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'dra ba med pa bsgrub pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar zhi ba de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag rab tu zhi ba la gzhol bar yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar rtsa ba med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag rtsa ba med pa'i chos dam pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar mtha' dang dbus med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar chags pa med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag chags pa med pa'i mtha' dang mur thug par yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar bsgribs pa med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sgrib pa thams cad rab tu bsal ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar 'jig rten na rgyu ba med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad rgyu ba med par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar 'jig rten du ma gtogs pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dga' 'khor ba thams cad du ma gtogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar mngon par 'du bya ba med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las gyen du 'phags par yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag de bzhin nyid du gnas par yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar chos thams cad dang 'byor pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad spyod pa thos pa la brtson par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar chos thams cad la yod pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i spyod pa yongs su 'grub par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar chos thams cad dang bral ba med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par mi 'bral bar yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar chos thams cad la zad pa med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad la yongs su bsngo ba mi zad pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar chos thams cad dang 'gal ba med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'gal ba med par yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar chos thams cad kyi mdo yin pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad ma lus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar chos thams cad la rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar chos thams cad las ma 'das pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar zil gyis mi non pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad zil gyis mi non pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar mi sgul ba de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bdud thams cad kyi las kyis mi sgul ba'i sems dang ldan par yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar ma 'khrugs pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad ma 'khrugs par spyad pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar g.yo ba med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad g.yo ba med pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar zad pa med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad kyis mi zad par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar byang chub yin pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag chos thams cad rnam par 'tshang rgya ba mthong bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar zhig pa med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa 'jig pa med par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar snang ba yin pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad kyis ye shes kyi snang ba chen po rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o; ; de bzhin nyid ji ltar brjod du med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag brjod pa thams cad brjod du med par shes par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid kyis ji ltar 'gro ba thams cad yang dag par gzung ba de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yang dag par gzung ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / ji ltar de bzhin nyid spyod pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag brjod pa dang spyod pa thams cad ma lus par yongs su shes pa'i ye shes kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar chos rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad ma lus pa la 'gro ba de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya bas mngon par sangs rgyas shing rnam par 'phrul ba yang dag par bstan pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'jig rten thams cad kyis yongs su rtog pa rnam par rtog pa med par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar lus thams cad la yod pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag tshad med pa'i lus kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par dgang pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ltar skye ba med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag skye ba med pas skye ba mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa bstan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / de bzhin nyid ji ltar gang na yang med pa ma yin pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dus gsum du gtogs pa'i lus thams cad kyis thams cad du rnam par 'phrul zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis brlabs pa yang dag par bstan pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ / ji ltar de bzhin nyid mtshan mo la yod pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dus thams cad du bla na med pa'i snang ba thob cing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid nyin mo la yod pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'gro ba kun gyi nyin mor bgrang ba thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba yongs su ston pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu dgod cing 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na don yod pa rnam par dag par gyur cig / ji ltar zla ba dang yud tsam la de bzhin nyid yod pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'gro ba thams cad kyis dus thams cad skad cig gcig tu khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir dus la 'jug par mkhas pa la rab tu gnas par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid dbyar gyi dus la yod pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dbang po rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu shes par bya ba'i phyir bskal pa'i gnas sna tshogs su dbang po rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid 'du ba dang 'jig pa'i bskal pa la yod pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag par gdul ba'i phyir bskal pa thams cad du rnam par dag pa rnam par bkod pas skye ba med cing gos pa med par gnas par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid phyi ma'i mtha' la yod pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis smon lam chen po las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir phyi ma'i bskal pa'i mur thug pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa rnam par dag par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid 'gro ba'i dus la yod pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems kyi skad cig gcig tu yang 'bral ba med par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi sems skad cig gcig gis sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid thams cad du 'gro ba de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis khams gsum thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur pa'i phyir thams cad zil gyis gnon pa thob par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid dngos po dang dngos po med pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dngos po med pa yongs su shes pa'i phyir dngos po thams cad rnam par dag par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid dag pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis tshogs chen po rgyu chen pos 'byung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su dag par gyur cig / de bzhin nyid ji ltar 'od dang pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems kyi 'od dang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad rab tu thob par gyur cig / de bzhin nyid ji ltar dri ma med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis dri ma med pa'i sems yongs su rdzogs shing dri ma thams cad byang bar gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid bdag gi med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i phyir tshad med pa yongs su gzung bar sems bskyed pa rnam par dag par gyur cig / de bzhin nyid ji ltar mnyam pa nyid yin pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos thams cad snang zhing rab rib med pas mnyam par ye shes kyi 'byung gnas thams cad rab tu thob par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid bgrang du med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chos kyi sprin gyis rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa dang / stobs kyi mdzod grangs med pa la gnas par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas su gyur pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad nye bar blangs pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa la rab tu 'god par gyur cig / de bzhin nyid ji ltar sems can gyi khams rnam par phye ba thams cad la yod pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis thogs pa med pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pas sems can thams cad mngon du red par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid shes pa dang / brjod pa dang / rnam par brjod pa dang / brda dang / gang zag thams cad la yod pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sgra grags pa thams cad shes pas sems can gyi khams thams cad shes par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad shes pa'i mngon par shes pa yang dag par 'dzin pa la mkhas par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid 'gro ba thams cad las rnam par 'das shing / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i mthar thug pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba la rab tu brten par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad las 'das par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid yangs pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'khrul pa med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la shin tu brtson pas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid nam yang yal ba med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ye shes chen po la sems can thams cad rab tu dgod pa'i phyir bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu brtson par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid chos 'byams klas pa thams cad la yod pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa'i dran pa rnam par dag pas bsod nams kyi rgyud 'byams klas pa gzung bar gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid bsngags pa mtha' yas pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thob pa'i phyir ye shes bsngags pa mtha' yas pa khong du chud par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid nye bar len pa med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'gro ba thams cad nye bar bzung pa rnam par dag cing chos thams cad la len pa med par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid g.yo ba med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pas mi g.yo zhing brtan pa dang / shin tu gnas par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid sangs rgyas kyi yul du gyur pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yul zhi bar bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyis ye shes kyi yul yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid mi 'phrog pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis mu stegs can gzhan dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcad pa'i phyir bdud kyi las thams cad kyis mi 'phrog par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid bsgom pa yang ma yin/ mi bsgom pa yang ma yin pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rnam par rtog pa thams cad rab tu spang ba'i phyir dngos po dang dngos po med pa thams cad la rnam par mi rtog par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid bya ba med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub kyi sems kyi rgyan thams cad 'thob par brtson pa'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bas dma' ba med par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid 'gro ba'i smra ba la yod pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis skad la mkhas pa'i rgyud kyis shin tu 'phags par 'gyur ba'i phyir skad rnam par phye ba shes pa mngon par shes par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid chos thams cad la ltos pa med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas byung ba'i phyir sems can thams cad ltos pa med par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid sa nas sar 'gro ba de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis kun tu bzang po'i rgyan thob pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi gnas ye shes kyis thob par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid gcad du med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyis mi 'jigs pa gcad du med pa rab tu thob par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid zag pa med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos shes pa'i tshul gyis rnam par shes pa'i phyir zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub kyi sems yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid kyi chos gang yang 'gag pa med cing / chos gang yang mngon par sangs rgyas pa med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa sems bskyed pas rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir chos thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid sngon gyi mthas zad par ma gyur pa dang / phyi ma'i mthas rgyas par 'gyur ba med cing / da ltar byung bas rnam pa tha dad par ma gyur pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'khor ba thams cad las rnam par 'da' ba'i phyir byang chub kyi sems gsar pa gsar ba'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag pa dang ldan par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid dus gsum du rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis da ltar byung ba'i dus la skad cig rnam par dag pa'i phyir sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par dag par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su 'grub pa'i rgyu yin pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis shin tu brtson pa'i brtson 'grus thob pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rab tu grub par gyur cig / ji ltar de bzhin nyid nam yang kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur zhing shin tu rnam par dag pa de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa shin tu spangs par gyur cig / ces de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'jig rten thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir zhing thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'thob bo/ / chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med cing phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir 'jig rten thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'thob bo/ / thams cad mkhyen par smon pas shin tu 'byung ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid 'thob bo/ / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid 'thob bo; / rang bzhin 'khrugs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'thob bo/ / tshig gi tshul thams cad la mkhas pa'i rgyus yongs su shes pa'i phyir dus thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'thob bo/ / ji ltar bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'thob bo/ / dus ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor ba'i sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rgyun mi gcod pa'i phyir dus thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'thob bo/ / 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gos pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i phyir las kyi rnam par smin pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'thob bo/ / 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'gal bar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba dang / byin gyi rlabs mnyam pa nyid 'thob ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /

“Great enlightening beings always dedicate their good will in this way, to cause all sentient beings to encounter the cloud of pure coolness showering the rain of truth, to cause all sentient beings to always encounter the excellent environment of fields of virtue, to cause all sentient beings to be able to enter the treasury of the spirit of enlightenment and preserve it themselves, to cause all sentient beings to shed all veils and live properly, to cause all sentient beings to attain knowledge of unhindered spiritual faculties, to cause all sentient beings to attain free bodies appearing everywhere, to cause all sentient beings to achieve supreme knowledge of all ways of liberation and bring about unfailing benefit, to cause all sentient beings to purify all creatures, to cause all sentient beings to be able to consummate universal knowledge, to cause all sentient beings to be unshakable and unobstructed in mind.
“Great enlightening beings, seeing delightful countries, gardens and groves, plants, trees, and fruits, distinguished scents and excellent clothing, rare jewels and goods, various decorations, or seeing delightful villages, towns, or hamlets, or seeing the majesty of sovereigns, or seeing abodes free from clamor, employ their knowledge of means and diligently cultivate innumerable sublime virtues, earnestly seeking good for the sake of sentient beings, never slacking off, widely gathering much good, vast as the ocean, and cover all with infinite good, being bases of myriad good things, expediently dedicating roots of goodness without discrimination, pointing out infinite various roots of goodness, always knowingly observing all sentient beings, their minds always remembering the realms of roots of goodness. They ceaselessly dedicate to sentient beings roots of goodness as impartial as true thusness. At such a time, they dedicate the roots of goodness in this way: ‘May all sentient beings attain the delightful visions of the enlightened, see the true nature of things, equal and impartial, without any grasping or attachment, complete and pure; may all sentient beings see the most delightful, perfect offerings of the Enlightened Ones; may all sentient beings be reborn in all the most delightful pure buddha-lands, free of all afflictions; may all sentient beings manage to perceive the most delightful teaching of the Buddhas; may all sentient beings always happily preserve the pleasing practices of all enlightening beings; may all sentient beings acquire the enjoyable eyes of the wise and see without obstruction; may all sentient beings always see all pleasing things, nothing offensive; may all sentient beings realize all delightful truths and diligently preserve them; may all sentient beings attain pure illumination in the pleasing teachings of all Buddhas; may all sentient beings cultivate all the delightful attitudes of generosity of enlightening beings; may all sentient beings attain fearlessness and be able to expound all admirable teachings; may all sentient beings attain the enlightening beings’ extremely delightful most profound concentration; may all sentient beings attain the enlightening beings’ most pleasant methods of mnemonic spells; may all sentient beings attain enlightening beings’ most admirable analytic knowledge; may all sentient beings be able to manifest enlightening beings’ most delightful autonomous spiritual powers; may all sentient beings be able to expound the pleasing most profoundly wonderful teaching in the great congregations of the Buddhas; may all sentient beings be able to skillfully analyze and explain the most pleasing expressions of differentiation; may all sentient beings always be able to activate most pleasant impartial great compassion; may all sentient beings in every thought activate the most admirable aspiration for enlightenment, always causing their senses to be joyful and blissful; may all sentient beings be able to enter all the most pleasant houses of the enlightened ones; may all sentient beings achieve the admirable action whereby they are able to harmonize and pacify, taming sentient beings unceasingly; may all sentient beings attain the most pleasing inexhaustible eloquence of enlightening beings, expounding all truths; may all sentient beings abide for unspeakably many unspeakable numbers of eons in all pleasant worlds, teaching and transforming sentient beings without wearying; may all sentient beings, by means of innumerable techniques, be able to understand and enter into all the most delightful teachings of the Buddhas; may all sentient beings attain delightful unobstructed liberative techniques and know all things have no basis; may all sentient beings attain the delightful realm of freedom from greed and craving, know all things are ultimately nondual, and cut through all barriers; may all sentient beings develop the delightful way of enlightening beings which is free from inanity; may all sentient beings attain the diamond-mine mind of effort and accomplish the delightful path of universal knowledge; may all sentient beings be endowed with delightful unobstructed roots of goodness and destroy all afflictions; may all sentient beings find the delightful door of omniscience and realize true awakening throughout the world.’ When great enlightening beings cultivate such roots of goodness, they gain the light of knowledge; they are taken into the care of good teachers; the sun of wisdom of the Buddhas illumines their minds, forever annihilating the darkness of ignorance. They diligently practice the true teaching, enter into works of knowledge, and learn the stages of knowledge. They spread roots of goodness, filling the cosmos, dedicating them wisely. They plumb the depths of the source of enlightening beings’ roots of goodness; by means of knowledge they enter deeply into the ocean of liberative means and develop immeasurably great roots of goodness.
“Great enlightening beings dedicate these roots of goodness in this way: they do not cling to the world, they do not grasp sentient beings; their minds are pure, not relying on anything; they are correctly mindful of all things and dismiss discriminatory views; they do not give up the independent wisdom of all Buddhas; they accord with all impartial truths, and do not destroy the Buddha’s true characteristics; they do not deviate from the correct way of dedication of all Buddhas; they look upon the triple world equally, without any image of sentient beings; they follow the path of Buddha well and explain its principles well, with profound understanding of their meaning; they enter the supreme stage and awaken to the real truth; their knowledge is complete, their faith is firm; though they practice correct actions well, they know the nature of action is empty; they understand all things are like phantoms, and know all things have no intrinsic essence of their own; they observe all meanings and all kinds of practices according to their conventional explanations and are not attached to them; they abolish all causes and conditions of grasping and clinging; they know the truth and see the nature of all things being null and void; they comprehend that all things have the same unique real character; they know the characteristics of things are not mutually opposed; they live with enlightening beings and practice their path; taking all sentient beings into their care, they enter the door of dedication of all enlightening beings of past, future, and present; their minds are not startled or frightened by the Buddha’s teachings; with minds of boundless kindness, compassion, joy, and equanimity, they cause all sentient beings to attain purity; in the worlds of the ten directions, they do not develop selfish, possessive grasping and clinging; they do not conceive of anything in the world; they do not give rise to obsession with any objects; they diligently practice all ways to transcend the world and have no attachments to or reliance on any mundane realm; their insight into the profound, wonderful path is accurate and steady, and they are rid of all erroneous views; they understand the real truth.
“Just as true thusness permeates all places, without boundaries, so also does their dedication of roots of goodness pervade everywhere unbounded; just as true thusness has reality as its essence, so likewise does their dedication of roots of goodness have as its essence understanding of the reality of all things; just as true thusness always retains its original nature without change, so too does their dedication of roots of goodness preserve its original nature unchanging throughout; just as true thusness has as its nature the essencelessness of all things, so also does their dedication of roots of goodness have as its nature the understanding of the essencelessness of all things; just as the mark of true thusness is signlessness, so too is the mark of their dedication of roots of goodness the signlessness of all things; just as those who realize true thusness never backslide, likewise those who attain this dedication of roots of goodness never retreat from the Buddha teachings; just as true thusness is the sphere of action of all Buddhas, so too is this dedication of roots of goodness the sphere of action of all Buddhas; just as the realm of true thusness is unconnected to any mark of boundary or realm, so also is the dedication of roots of goodness free from any sign of boundary or realm, yet it is the realm of all Buddhas of past, present, and future; just as true thusness can have establishments, so too can the dedication of roots of goodness establish all sentient beings; just as the nature of true thusness always adapts, so also does the dedication of roots of goodness forever adapt ceaselessly; just as true thusness cannot be measured, likewise the dedication of roots of goodness is equal to the realm of space and the minds of all sentient beings cannot measure it; just as true thusness fills all, so also does the dedication of roots of goodness pervade the cosmos in a single instant; just as true thusness is eternal and inexhaustible, so also is the dedication of roots of goodness ultimately inexhaustible; just as true thusness has no compare, likewise the dedication of roots of goodness can fulfill all the Buddha teachings without compare; just as the essence of true thusness is stable, so also is the essence of dedication of roots of goodness stable, impervious to delusions and afflictions; just as true thusness is indestructible, so too is the dedication of roots of goodness stable, impervious to delusions and afflictions; just as true thusness is indestructible, so too is the dedication of roots of goodness, which no creatures can damage; just as the body of true thusness is illumination, so also the nature of the dedication of roots of goodness is universal illumination; just as true thusness is omnipresent, likewise the dedication of roots of goodness is present in all places; just as true thusness pervades all times, so also does the dedication of roots of goodness pervade all times; just as the nature of true thusness is eternally pure, likewise the dedication of roots of goodness abides in the world yet is essentially pure; just as true thusness is unhindered by things, so too the dedication of roots of goodness extends everywhere unobstructed; just as true thusness is the eye of all phenomena, likewise the dedication of roots of goodness is an eye for all sentient beings; just as the nature of true thusness has no fatigue, so also is the dedication of roots of goodness, cultivating all the practices of enlightening beings with never any fatigue; just as the inherent nature of true thusness is most profound, so too is the nature of dedication of roots of goodness most profound; just as there is not a single thing in true thusness, likewise there is not a single thing in the essence of dedication of roots of goodness; just as the nature of true thusness is not manifestation, similarly the substance of dedication of roots of goodness is subtle and refined and hardly visible; just as true thusness is apart from all defilements and obscurations, so too is dedication of roots of goodness, the eye of wisdom pure and unclouded by ignorance; just as the nature of true thusness has no equal, so also is the dedication of roots of goodness, accomplishing all practices of enlightening beings, peerlessly supreme; just as the essential nature of true thusness is absolutely quiescent, so also is dedication of roots of goodness well able to accord with the truth of quiescence; just as true thusness has no basis, likewise is dedication of roots of goodness able to penetrate all baseless phenomena; just as the inherent nature of true thusness is boundless, similarly dedication of roots of goodness purifies boundless numbers of sentient beings; just as the essential nature of true thusness has no attachments, likewise the dedication of roots of goodness is ultimately divorced from all attachments; just as true thusness has no obstructions, so also the dedication of roots of goodness eliminates all barriers in the world; just as true thusness is not a mundane sphere, so too the dedication of roots of goodness cannot be carried out by any worldling; just as the essential nature of the true thusness has no abode, so also is the dedication of roots of goodness not the dwelling place of any birth and death; just as true thusness by nature has no fabrication, so too does dedication of roots of goodness relinquish all fabrication; just as the essential nature of true thusness remains steady, so also does dedication of roots of goodness abide steadily in truth; just as true thusness corresponds with all things, so too does dedication of roots of goodness correspond with the learning and practice of the enlightening beings; just as true thusness is inherently always equal in all things, likewise does the dedication of roots of goodness practice impartiality in all worlds; just as true thusness is not apart from all phenomena, similarly dedication of roots of goodness never ever abandons the world; just as true thusness is ultimately inexhaustible in all things, so too is dedication of roots of goodness inexhaustibly directed toward sentient beings; just as true thusness is not at variance with all things, likewise dedication of roots of goodness is not at variance with the teachings of all Buddhas of past, present, and future; just as true thusness universally includes all things, so too does dedication of roots of goodness completely include the roots of goodness of all sentient beings; just as true thusness is of the same essential nature as all things, so is dedication of roots of goodness of the same essential nature of the Buddhas of all times; just as true thusness is not divorced from all things. likewise dedication of roots of goodness holds all mundane and transmundane things; just as true thusness cannot be obscured, similarly none in any world can obscure dedication of roots of goodness; just as true thusness cannot be stirred, in the same way dedication of roots of goodness cannot be disturbed by any demonic activity; just as the essence of true thusness has no pollution, so too is dedication of roots of goodness like this, cultivating the practices of enlightening beings without defilement; just as true thusness is without change, so also is dedication of roots of goodness, compassionately caring for sentient beings without change of mind; just as true thusness is inexhaustible, so is dedication of roots of goodness—it cannot be exhausted by mundane norms; just as the nature of true thusness is always aware, likewise dedication of roots of goodness is able to be aware of all truths; just as true thusness cannot be lost or destroyed, dedication of roots of goodness is also like this, arousing great commitment to sentient beings which is never lost or destroyed; just as true thusness is able to greatly illumine, in the same way dedication of roots of goodness illumines all worlds with the light of great knowledge; just as true thusness cannot be explained in words, likewise all words and speech cannot explain dedication of roots of goodness; just as true thusness holds all worlds, likewise dedication of roots of goodness holds all the practices of enlightening beings; just as true thusness goes along with conventional verbal expression, similarly dedication of roots of goodness goes along with all verbal expression of wisdom; just as true thusness pervades all phenomena, so does dedication of roots of goodness pervade all buddha-fields in the ten directions, manifesting great spiritual powers and fulfilling true enlightenment; just as true thusness has no discrimination, so too dedication of roots of goodness has no discrimination in regard to all beings in all worlds; just as true thusness is in all bodies, so also is dedication of roots of goodness in the infinite bodies of the lands of the ten directions; just as the essential nature of true thusness is birthless, so too is dedication of roots of goodness, expediently manifesting birth yet having no birth; just as true thusness is omnipresent, in the same way dedication of roots of goodness is omnipresent in the buddha-lands of all times and places, everywhere manifesting spiritual powers; just as true thusness permeates the night, so also dedication of roots of goodness emits great light in all nights, giving it to perform buddha-work; just as true thusness permeates the day, so does dedication of roots of goodness cause all sentient beings in the day to see Buddha’s spiritual displays expounding the nonregressive teaching, free from defilement, pure, beneficial to all; just as true thusness is omnipresent in the fortnight and month, the dedication of roots of goodness requires skill in dealing with the succession of seasons in all worlds, knowing all times in a single moment; just as true thusness is present throughout the years, likewise does dedication of roots of goodness abide for measureless eons, clarifying and maturing all faculties, developing them to completion; just as true thusness is omnipresent in ages of becoming and decay, so also dedication of roots of goodness abides in all ages, pure and unaffected, educating beings and purifying them; just as true thusness extends throughout the future, dedication of roots of goodness cultivates the pure sublime practices of enlightening beings throughout the future, fulfilling their great vows, never retreating; just as true thusness pervades past, present, and future, dedication of roots of goodness causes sentient beings to see the Buddhas of past, present, and future in a single instant, never parting for a moment; just as true thusness is in all places, so too dedication of roots of goodness transcends the triple world and reaches everywhere in complete freedom; just as true thusness abides in existence and nonexistence, similarly dedication of roots of goodness comprehends all existent and nonexistent things, ultimately pure; just as the essential nature of true thusness is pure, dedication of roots of goodness is able to assemble aids to enlightenment by means of expedient techniques and purify the practices of enlightening beings; just as the essential nature of true thusness is immaculate, similarly dedication of roots of goodness causes enlightening beings to attain the immaculate mind of concentration; just as the essential nature of true thusness has no defilement, so too is dedication of roots of goodness beyond all defilements, fulfilling all pure intentions; just as true thusness has no self or possessions, dedication of roots of goodness fills all buddha-lands in the ten directions with the selfless, nonpossessive pure mind; just as the essential nature of true thusness is impartial, likewise dedication of roots of goodness attains impartial universal knowledge, illumining all things, free from all clouds of ignorance; just as true thusness is beyond all calculations and measurements, likewise dedication of roots of goodness abides together with the treasury of powerful teaching of the vehicle of universal knowledge which is beyond all calculation and measurement, spreading vast clouds of teaching throughout all worlds in the ten directions; just as true thusness is poised in equality, so too is dedication of roots of goodness, initiating all enlightening practices, poised equanimously in the path of omniscience; just as true thusness subsists in all realms of sentient beings, similarly dedication of roots of goodness fulfills unhindered knowledge of all kinds of ways of liberation and appears in all realms of sentient beings; just as true thusness has no discrimination and universally abides in knowledge of all sounds, so too the dedication of roots of goodness has in it knowledge of all sounds of speech and can everywhere manifest all kinds of speech sounds to teach sentient beings; just as true thusness is forever detached from the world, so also does dedication of roots of goodness cause sentient beings to be forever detached from the world; just as the essential nature of true thusness is immensely vast, so too dedication of roots of goodness can retain the extensive Buddha teachings of past, future, and present, never forgetting, diligently cultivating all practices of enlightening beings; just as true thusness is uninterrupted, likewise dedication of roots of goodness, out of desire to place all sentient beings securely on the ground of great knowledge, cultivates enlightening practice unceasingly through all ages; just as the essential nature of true thusness is spacious and open, so too is the dedication of roots of goodness, with pure mindfulness unobstructed, containing all spacious open doors to truth; just as true thusness embraces all kinds of creatures, similarly dedication of roots of goodness realizes knowledge of innumerable types and species, and cultivates the genuine sublime practices of enlightening beings; just as true thusness has no grasping or attachment, dedication of roots of goodness too has no clinging to anything, destroying all mundane grasping and attachment, purifying all worldings; just as the essential nature of true thusness is unmoving, likewise dedication of roots of goodness abides steadily in the perfect complete practical commitments of Universal Good, ultimately unmoving; just as true thusness is the sphere of Buddhas, so too dedication of roots of goodness causes sentient beings to fulfill all spheres of great knowledge and annihilate the spheres of afflictions, causing them to be purified; just as true thusness cannot be ruled or conquered, so also dedication of roots of goodness is not ruled or conquered by any delusive actions or erroneous theories; just as true thusness is not something that can be cultivated yet not something that cannot be cultivated, similarly dedication of roots of goodness abandons all illusions and attachments and has no discrimination between cultivating and not cultivating; just as true thusness has no withdrawal, so also is dedication of roots of goodness like this, always seeing Buddhas, rousing the aspiration for enlightenment adorned with great vows, never withdrawing or giving up; just as true thusness universally contains the sounds of all speech of all beings, similarly dedication of roots of goodness potentiates acquisition of superknowledge of all different languages, producing all kinds of utterances; just as true thusness has no seeking in respect to anything, likewise dedication of roots of goodness causes sentient beings to ride the vehicle of Universal Good to emancipation, having no craving for anything; just as true thusness abides in all stages, so too dedication of roots of goodness causes all sentient beings to give up the stages of mundanity and abide in the stages of knowledge and wisdom, adorning themselves with the practice of Universal Good; just as true thusness has no end, dedication of roots of goodness is also like this, attaining fearlessness in all truths, expounding them everywhere according to the languages of the audience, without end; just as true thusness is free from all taints, so too dedication of roots of goodness causes all sentient beings to develop objective knowledge, comprehend the truth, and fulfill the untainted qualities of enlightenment; just as there is not the slightest thing that can damage or disturb true thusness and cause it to be even slightly unaware, likewise dedication of roots of goodness causes universal awareness of all truths with a boundless mind pervading the cosmos; just as true thusness has no beginning in the past, no end in the future, and no variation in the present, likewise dedication of roots of goodness continually renews the vow of the aspiration for enlightenment for all sentient beings, enabling them all to be purified and forever freed from birth and death; just as true thusness has no discrimination among past, present, and future, dedication of roots of goodness is also like this, the mind always aware in each instant of the present, and totally pure in past and future; just as true thusness develops all Buddhas and enlightening beings, likewise dedication of roots of goodness, initiating means of expediting all great vows, develops the great knowledge of the Buddhas; just as true thusness is ultimately pure and not concurrent with the afflictions, so too dedication of roots of goodness can extinguish all sentient beings’ afflictions and fulfill all pure knowledge and wisdom.
“When great enlightening beings practice dedication in this way, they realize the equality of all buddha-fields, because they adorn and purify all worlds; they realize the equality of all sentient beings, because they turn the wheel of the teaching of nonobstruction for all of them; they realize the equality of enlightening beings, because they produce all knowledge and vows; they realize the equality of all Buddhas, because they observe the essence of the Buddhas is nondual; they realize the equality of all things, because they know the nature of things is invariable; they realize the equality of all worlds, because by means of knowledge of expedients they understand all manners of speaking; they realize the equality of all practices of enlightening beings, because they dedicate all roots of goodness as they plant them; they realize the equality of all times, because they diligently carry out buddha work at all times, never ceasing; they realize the equality of all fruits of action, because they have no obsession with or attachment to any mundane or transmundane roots of goodness, while consummating them all; they realize the equality of spiritual powers of Buddhas, because they manifest buddha work adapted to the world.

'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba ste/ brgyad pa'o/ /
de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang / seng+ge'i nga ro 'jigs pa med par bsgrag par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi sgo rnam par dag pa mtha' dang dbus med pa rab tu 'thob bo/ / dus thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtha' dang dbus med pa tshad med pa rab tu 'thob bo; ; dbyangs gcig gis sems can gyi khams thams cad shes par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung mtha' dang dbus med pa mngon par sgrub pa yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad skra'i sbugs gcig tu yongs su 'du bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ / sems can thams cad kyi lus rdul gcig la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ / sems can gcig gi lus las sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad rab tu 'thob bo/ / ting nge 'dzin gcig la ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par chos gcig gi tshig shin tu bstan pas sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcad pa zad mi shes pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ / sems can gyi khams ma lus par stobs bcu'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpa' ba rlabs po che mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /

“This is great enlightening beings’ eighth dedication, dedication with the character of true thusness. When great enlightening beings abide in this dedication, they attain realization of innumerable pure teachings, and are able to make the lion roar of the enlightened, free and without fear; with skill in means they teach and develop countless enlightening beings, never ceasing at any time; they attain the infinite complete body of Buddhahood, one body filling all worlds; they attain the infinite complete voice of Buddhahood, one utterance enlightening all beings; they attain the infinite complete power of Buddhahood, able to contain all lands in a single pore; they attain the infinite complete occult abilities of Buddhahood, placing sentient beings in a single atom; they attain the infinite complete liberation of Buddhahood, manifesting all spheres of buddhahood in the body of a single being, attaining true enlightenment; they attain the infinite complete concentration of Buddhahood, able to manifest all concentrations in one concentration; they attain the infinite complete powers of analysis and elucidation of Buddhahood, explaining a single statement of principle forever without exhausting it, removing the doubts and confusion of all sentient beings; they attain the infinite complete being of Buddhahood, endowed with the ten powers of Buddhahood, manifesting the attainment of true enlightenment throughout the realm of sentient beings. This is great enlightening beings’ dedication of all roots of goodness in accord with the character of true thusness.”
de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /
Then the enlightening being Diamond Banner, invested with the awesome power of Buddha, looked over the ten directions and spoke these verses:

de dag bsam pa brtan pa'i sems ldan pa/ / dran pa gsal bas rmongs pa med gyur cing / / brtan zhing des la yongs su gdung med pa/ / mtshungs med de dag bsod nams yang dag gsog /
de dag mi mthun med pa'i yid ldan zhing / / bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag pa rnams/ / ji snyed sna tshogs 'jig rten skye ba yi; ; las kyi rnam pa thams cad rmongs med mkhas/ /
de dag las kyi rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ / rnam pa tha dad yangs la rjes su sems/ / des ni 'jig rten ma lus bde bar byed; ; de la yid kyis rtag tu mngon par brtson/ /
de dag 'gro ba kun dang 'gal med yin/ / dga' bar byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa ste/ / las kyi rnam pa ci 'drar rnam phye ba/ / de dag yang dag sgrub par mngon par brtson/ /
