kha lo sgyur sar thams cad gzung sems ldan/ / yongs su gdung med chags med yid dang ldan/ / don dang chos nyid de dag rjes su 'thob/ / 'gro la phan phyir de dag mngon par brtson/ /
de dag yid kyis dge ba rtogs gyur cing / / gang dag rnam pa tha dad grangs mang ba/ / de dag rgyud dang tshul yang rab tu shes/ / de dag 'jig rten phan phyir yongs su bsngo/ /
shin tu yangs pa'i tshul gyi dam pa 'di/ / mnyam yangs ye shes rtag tu tshul shes pas/ / gnas rnams thams cad ma lus mthong byas shing / / de bzhin nyid ltar yongs su bsngo ba byed/ /
gang la de bzhin nyid de yod pa yi/ / rnam pa thams cad 'jig rten blangs byas shing / / 'jig rten rgyud rnams chags pa med pa'i phyir/ / de 'dra'i las su brtan pa yongs su bsngo/ /
de ni kun tu 'gro bar rtogs byas shing / / de bzhin nyid kyi tshul rgyud gang yin dang / / dmigs pa dag dang 'on tam dmigs med pa/ / de ltar bsod nams yid du 'ong ba bsngo/ /
mun la yod dang nyin la yod pa dang / / yud du yan man de bzhin zla yod dang / / lo la yod dang bskal la yod pa'am/ / de bzhin ji bzhin de bzhin nyid bzhin bsngo/ /
dus la yod pa'am zhing la yod pa dang / / sems can yod pa'am chos la yod pa dang / / kun la yod pa'am yod pa ma yin pa/ / de bzhin bsod nams ma lus yongs su bsngo/ /
de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ci 'dra ba/ / rang bzhin de 'drar sems kyang bsgyur byas shing / / ji ltar de bzhin nyid de rjes 'gro ba/ / de ltar bsod nams gcig min yongs su bsngo/ /
de bzhin ji bzhin de bzhin nyid kyi dngos/ / de la chos nyid khang yang yod med cing / / rang bzhin mi ldan ji ltar de bzhin nyid/ / de ltar las rnams mkhas pa yongs su bsngo/ /
de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid ci 'dra dang / / de bzhin nyid kyi dang tshul ci 'dra dang / / de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ci 'dra ba/ / de 'dra las rnams kun kyang yongs su bsngo/ /
de dag mtha' yas las la rab zhugs shing / / de bzhin nyid de ji ltar mtha' yas te/ / de la chags dang bcings pa med pa ltar/ / de ltar las rnams shin tu dag par byed/ /
de ltar rgyal sras shin tu mkhas pa dag / bsam pa mi g.yo shin tu brtan thob pa/ / ye shes stobs ldan tshul la mkhas gyur pa/ / de dag rgyal ba'i mdzod kyi tshul la zhugs/ /
de dag tshul gyi rgyal po'i tshul shes pas/ / de la chags dang bcings pa med pa'i phyir/ / chags med sems ni 'jug par mi 'gyur te/ / 'jug par byed pa'ang gang yang dmigs pa med/ /
chos kyi lus ni rab tu thob byas shing / / 'gro ba kun las mtshan nyid ji bzhin pa/ / chos nyid de la mtshan nyid med gsungs pa/ / de 'dra'i mtshan nyid chos la rab tu zhugs/ /
de ltar de dag 'grogs pa bsam mi khyab/ / de la sems ni lhag ma med par byed/ / bsam yas chos rnams kun la rab tu zhugs/ / sems ni sems min rnam par dben pa shes/ /
de dag chos dben nyid la 'jug byed cing / / de ltar chos nyid rjes su sems pa byed/ / g.yo dang rlom sems thams cad 'gag pa ste/ / de phyir yon tan rnam par grags pa yin/ /
de dag rnam smin thams cad ma lus par/ / ye shes rgyas btab zad par mi 'gyur te/ / de ni mi zad mi zad nyid kyi dngos/ / mi zad mtha' yi tshul dang 'gal ba med/ /
bsam pa lus kyi phyi rol yod pa min/ / sems ni nang na'ang yod pa ma yin te/ / dus rnams gang na'ang sems ni yod pa min/ / rlom sems rlom chos med pas zhi bar 'gyur/ /
de 'dra'i smon lam ldan pa rgyal sras rnams/ / chos kyi rang bzhin brtson pa zhi ba stong pa ste/ / chos rnams ma lus thams cad g.yo ba med/ / bdag nyid rgyal bas rnam par sangs rgyas med/ /
de bzhin nyid gang 'gro ba kun mnyam pa'i/ / chos nyid mtshan nyid rjes su shes byas shing / / bsam yas mtshan nyid de dag mthong gyur nas/ / mtshan nyid med pa'i shes la rmongs pa med/ /
de ltar zab pa'i spyod pa rab brtson pa/ / de dag byang chub rtag par brtson pa ste/ / de dag smon lam de yang rtog pa med/ / 'gro ba kun gyi don du de dag brtson/ /
de dag 'jig rten rnams las 'das gyur cing / / 'chi 'pho yongs su rtog pa med byas te; ; sprul pa 'dra bar sems kyang rig byas nas/ / de dag 'gro ba gdul phyir rab tu 'jug /
de dag mthong dang dran pa 'di 'dra ste/ / las kyi smin pas 'jig rten byung ba yi/ / khams gsum pa yi sems can thams cad la/ / de dag yongs su bskyab par mngon par brtson/ /
'gro ba kun gyi 'du shes rgyu ba dang / / rnam par rtog pa ji snyed tha dad pa'i/ / skal ba mi mnyam de dag de bzhin shes/ / ngo bo nyid las nam yang phyir mi ldog /
shes pas mkhas pa chos rab bsngags pa rnams/ / 'gro ba kun la snying brtse'i sems ldan pas/ / chos kyi tshul la rjes su sems byed cing / / tshul mkhas de dag de ltar yongs su bsngo/ /

Enlightening beings’ determination is stable, With true mindfulness steadfast, free from ignorance and confusion. Their minds are flexible, always cool; They build up boundless virtuous practices.
Enlightening beings are humble and inoffensive; Their aspirations are all pure. They have attained the great light of wisdom, Able to illumine all acts.
Enlightening beings’ meditations and works are great, Variously different, extremely rare; They cultivate practice with determination, not retreating, Thereby to aid all living beings.
Their acts are infinitely various; Enlightening beings practice them all diligently, Adapting to sentient beings, not opposing their wishes, Causing all minds to be pure and joyous.
They have already ascended to the honored stage of the Human Tamer, Freed from all burning afflictions, their minds unobstructed; They know the meanings of all the teachings And practice them ever more diligently for the benefit of the living.
The good practices cultivated by enlightening beings Are measureless, countless, variously different; They know the particulars of all of them, And dedicate them to help living beings.
With subtle knowledge they ever examine The ultimate, universal truth, Cutting off all hypostases, Dedicating in accord with true thusness.
Just as true thusness pervades all, So do they embrace all worlds; This mind do enlightening beings dedicate To freeing sentient beings from attachment.
The power of enlightening beings’ vows is all-pervasive, Just as true thusness is omnipresent; Their mindfulness comprehends the seen and unseen, Whereby they dedicate virtues.
Subsisting in the night and the day, In the fortnight and the month, And in the year and the eon: As is true thusness, so is their practice.
In all times and all lands, All sentient beings and all phenomena— Abiding therein yet without dwelling anywhere, They dedicate practice like this.
Like the fundamental essence of true thusness, Such a great mind do enlightening beings awake: True thusness’s whereabouts is everywhere— Such practice do they dedicate.
As in the fundamental essence of true thusness There has never been a single thing, Ungraspable essence the true essence, Such work do they dedicate.
As is the character of true thusness, so is their work; As is the essence of true thusness, so is their work: As the essence of true thusness is basically real, So is their work the same as true thusness.
Just as true thusness has no limits, So too is their work boundless— And yet they have no ties therein, Therefore this work is pure.
Thus are brilliant true children of Buddha, Their will steadfast, unwavering; By their power of knowledge they comprehend well And enter the treasury of Buddhas’ techniques.
Awakening to the true teaching of Buddha, They are not obsessed or bound by it— Thus their free mind is unobstructed— They’ve never seen anything to originate.
The acts of the Buddhas’ reality body, The features of all worlds as they are, The explanation of the signs of things as signless: Knowing such characteristics is knowing the teachings.
Enlightening beings abide in the inconceivable, In which thought is inexhaustible: Entering this inconceivable realm, Thought and nonthought are both silenced.
Thus do they contemplate the nature of things, Comprehending all distinctions in acts; Obliterating all attachment to self, They abide in virtue, immovable.
The fruits of the acts of enlightening beings Are all stamped by inexhaustible knowledge; This infinity’s inherently null, Therefore inexhaustible expedients vanish.
Enlightening beings observe the mind is not outside And also is not found within; They know the nature of mind has no existence, Detached from self and things, forever extinct.
Thus do those buddha-children know The nature of all things is eternally void, And there’s not a single thing that can create— They realize selflessness, same as the Buddhas’.
They know that all worlds Are equal to the nature and characteristics of true thusness; Seeing these inconceivable characteristics, They can know the uncharacterized.
If any abide in this profound truth, Always happily cultivating enlightening practices, Desiring to aid all living beings, Adorned with great vows, unregressing,
They then transcend the mundane, Not creating erroneous concepts of birth and death, Comprehending the mind is like a magical production, Diligently cultivating practices to liberate sentient beings.
Enlightening beings observe the world with true awareness, Seeing that all comes from active conditions; They cultivate practices in order to liberate, Including all in the triple world.
They know the various differences of sentient beings Are discriminations of mental imagery and action: This they observe with complete clarity, Without destroying the nature of things.
The wise comprehend all Buddha teachings And dedicate such practices, Taking pity on all living beings, Causing them to contemplate rightly the truth.
de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin zhes bya ba ste; yongs su bsngo ba brgyad pa'o// //
shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba; bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa/

kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa zhes bya ba dgu pa gang zhe na/ kye; rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brnyas pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ 'khor ba bsgrub pa la brnyas pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsdu ba la brnyas pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su btsal ba la brnyas pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ bshags pa'i las la brnyas pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ rjes su yi rang ba'i rtsa ba la brnyas pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag bya ba'i las la brnyas pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ thal mo sbyar zhing btud pa'i las la brnyas pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ mchod rten la phyag bya ba dang / bla ma la phyag bya ba'i las la brnyas pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gsol ba gdab pa'i las la brnyas pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin te/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rab tu 'jug pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gi go skabs dbye bar byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la yid ches pa brtan par byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la bdag rab tu sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems kyi bdag nyid che ba nyid la rab tu gzhog pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gi phyir chags pa med pa'i sems la rab tu brtson par byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sbyin pa la rag las par yang dag par sgrub pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gi phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa nyams pa med pa rab tu sgrub pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pas dmigs pa'i yul la rab tu sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gi phyir stobs kyi shugs rab tu 'thob pa la yang dag par lta ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/

“What is great enlightening beings’ unattached, unbound, liberated dedication? Here they honor and respect all roots of goodness: that is to say, they honor and respect emancipation from birth and death, embodiment of all roots of goodness, seeking all roots of goodness, repentance of past acts, moral support of roots of goodness, expression of respect for Buddhas, making prostrations before tombs and shrines, and exhorting Buddhas to expound the teaching — they honor and respect such various roots of goodness, recognizing and approving them all.
“When great enlightening beings honor, respect, recognize and approve these roots of goodness, they are extremely delighted, and affirm their faith, attaining peace and stability themselves and also enabling others to attain peace and stability. They diligently cultivate roots of goodness without attachment, freely building them up, developing supreme determination, abiding in the realm of the enlightened, their power growing, able to see and know all. They dedicate the roots of goodness in this way:

'di ltar chags pa med pa dang; grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i lus kyi las rab tu grub par gyur cig / chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i ngag gi las phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/ chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i yid kyi las yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ thams cad du rab tu brtson pas chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i brtson pa la bsten par gyur cig/ phyogs thams cad du song zhing chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i dbyangs chags pa med pa'i gzungs 'thob par bya ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba yang dag par 'dzin cing chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba'i gzungs 'thob par bya ba rab tu thob par gyur cig /chos kyi sprin brjod du med pa ma lus par dkyil 'khor thams cad dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyis rab tu bstan pa'i phyir chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i dbyangs thams cad la mkhas pa'i gzungs rab tu thob par gyur cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson zhing chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa bskal pa thams cad tu yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gzungs rab tu thob par gyur cig/

with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to accomplish the deeds of Universal Good; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to purify the speech of Universal Good; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to perfect the mental action of Universal Good; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to arouse the vast energy of Universal Good; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to fulfill the methods of concentration formulae of unobstructed expression of Universal Good, their voices pervading the ten directions; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to fulfill the method of concentration formulae for perception of all Buddhas of Universal Good, always seeing all Buddhas of the ten directions; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to achieve and understand the method of concentration formulae of all sounds, the same as all sounds, expounding infinite principles; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to accomplish Universal Good’s method of concentration formulae abiding through all ages, cultivating enlightening practice everywhere in the ten directions;

phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug pa ma lus pa thams cad du sems can gcig gi lus la ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can ma lus pa'i lus la yang chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byin gyi rlabs thams cad sems can gcig gi lus la byin gyis rlob par gyur cig/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu brtson zhing chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po dang mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i gnas su/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mtha' dag lhag pa med cing ma lus par gzud pa bstan par byin gyis byin du rlob par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'dzud pa la chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i sgo gcig nas/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa mi zad pa yang dag par mthong bar gyur cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mngon sum du mthong ba'i phyir chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i sgo sna tshogs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par rnam par dgod pa mi zad pa la sems can thams cad rab tu 'jug par gyur cig/ yongs su skyo ba med pa'i sems la chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi sgo la/ sems du gdags pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yang dag par 'dzud pa dang / rab tu 'god pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la snying rje chen po yang dag par 'byung bar gyur cig /kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la gnas pa'i tshe chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i sems can thams cad kyi lus kyis sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yang dag par ston par gyur cig/ sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste/ sems can gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can thams cad ma lus pa la yang de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa'i stobs la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir/ chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i 'gro ba kun gyi brjod pa/ sems can gcig gi tshig rnam par gdags pa la byin gyis rlob par gyur cig/

dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i sems can gcig gi lus la/ sems can thams cad kyi lus yang dag par gzud par byin gyis byin du rlob cing / de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu thob par rang rang gis shes par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i me tog gcig la/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par rnam par dag par byin gyis brlabs pa yang dag par shes par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sems can thams cad gdul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste/ rnam par bstan par bya ba'i phyir chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i chos kyi dbyings su sgra dbyangs mngon par bsgrub pa mngon par sgrub par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i sngon gyi mtha'i bskal ba'i mur thug pa sems kyi skad cig re res shin tu ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi shugs kyi rgyan 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas par gtogs par thams cad du rjes su dran par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs 'byams klas pa thams cad du ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i phyir chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i bskal ba phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad tu gtogs par shin tu bstan pa la 'jug par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la brtson zhing chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su chos kyi dbyings thams cad snang ba gcig tu rgyas par bkang ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa thams cad snang ba byed par gyur cig/

with unattached, unbound, liberated minds to attain the power of freedom of Universal Good and contain the bodies of all beings in the body of each individual being, causing all to think they have attained the buddha-body; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to achieve the power of freedom of Universal Good and be able to adorn all worlds of the ten directions with a single flower; with unattached, unbound, liberated minds to accomplish the power of freedom of Universal Good and produce a great voice pervading the cosmos, heard in all buddha-lands, pacifying all beings; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to attain the power of freedom of Universal Good, able to enter, in each passing instant of the endless future, all worlds everywhere, adorning them as they wish by the spiritual power of Buddha; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to achieve the power of freedom of Universal Good and through the ages of the future always be able to enter into all worlds and manifest attainment of Buddhahood in the world; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to accomplish the practice of Universal Good, with one light illumining all worlds in the realm of space;

dge ba'i rtsa ba 'diskun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la nye bar spyod pa thob cing / chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su rgyud mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa'i rgyud ston par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa'i tshe/ bskal pa thams cad du zad par gyur kyang ye shes mtha' dang dbus med pa'i mthar mi 'gyur kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis byin gyi brlabs kyang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas rab tu grub par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa la brtson par byed pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma lus pas zhal bstan pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs shing / kun tu bzang po'i spyod yul la rab tu zhugs par bsam pas lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las la dub pa med par brtson zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / kun tu bzang po'i sems don gyi tshogs dang mi 'gal ba/ chos kyi lus ma nyams pa/ nges pa'i tshig gi sar rnam par dag pa/ spobs pa thams cad mi zad pa'i mdzod/ sems can thams cad gdul ba'i sar gyur pas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub rab tu thob par gyur cig; dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la brtson zhing / 'od mtha' yas pa dang; snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas chos kyi sgo re re la 'jug cing / de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi sgo nas 'gro zhing 'jug pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa'i mthar thug pa rab tu thob par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i rgyan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob ste/ dmigs pa re re zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thams cad la zhugs kyang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthar thug par mi 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis rgyal po de lta bu thob par gyur cig /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su tshe 'di nas nye bar bzung ste/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par rmongs pa med cing / rgyun mi 'chad par chos la gzhol zhing / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod par gyur pa'i rgyud brjod du med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i tshul thob par gyur cig/

with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to achieve the practice of Universal Good, attain immeasurable knowledge, be endowed with all spiritual powers, and explain all kinds of truths; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to accomplish the practice of Universal Good, and enter the eternal immeasurable spiritual knowledge of the enlightened; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to accomplish the practice of Universal Good, abide in the realm of the enlightened ones throughout the cosmos, and by the spiritual power of the enlightened cultivate the physical, verbal, and mental actions of the practices of enlightening beings, never flagging; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to accomplish the practice of Universal Good, and be pure in speech, not deviating from the truth or corrupting the teaching, with inexhaustible eloquence teaching and pacifying all sentient beings so that they may attain the unexcelled enlightenment of all Buddhas; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to cultivate the practice of Universal Good, and when entering into a single aspect of the teaching emit immeasurable light illuminating inconceivably many aspects the teaching, abide in the practices of enlightening beings, master of the teaching, arrive at the other shore adorned by Universal Good, and examine and gain understanding of every single object by means of universal knowledge, without universal knowledge being exhausted; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to live by the practice of Universal Good from this life forever onward, never ceasing, attaining omniscience and realizing innumerable truths, to be ultimately free from confusion and delusion in regard to truth;

dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la rab tu snang bar gyur pa'i sems bsgribs pa med pa'i chos kyi snang ba rab tu thob pas/ rgyun mi 'chad pa'i las la rab tu brtson cing / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu thob par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa thob pa bya ba la brtson zhing / thams cad kyi tshul dang / mtha' yas pa'i tshul dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba thams cad kyi tshul dang / chos kyi 'khor lo mtha' dang dbus med pa rab tu bskor ba'i tshul dang; dus brjod du med pa'i tshul dang / chos rnam pa tha dad pa bstan pa'i tshul dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i mdzod sa mtshams med pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad ma lus par bstan pa'i tshul dang / tshul dang tshul ma yin pa rjes su rtogs pa'i ye shes 'thob par bya ba rab tu thob par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su phyir mi ldog pa'i sems can/ byang chub tu yang dag par 'byung ba/ nyams pa med par bya ba dang / bstan pa dam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa'i mthar phyin par byed cing / kun tu bzang po'i las kyis bsral pas/ 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i lus kyi las yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su sems can gyi khams thams cad dga' bar bya ba'i tshig brjod du med pa la rab tu brtson zhing / dag gi las kyi rgyan thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i byin gyi rlabs la brtson pas/ sems can thams cad kyi rnam par brjod pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i ye shes rnam par dag pa yongs su thob par gyur cig/

with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to cultivate the work of Universal Good, with mastery of technique, attaining the light of truth and illumining the practices of enlightening beings without obstruction; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to cultivate the practice of Universal Good and attain knowledge of all means of liberation—that is, innumerable means, inconceivable means, the means of enlightening beings, means of universal knowledge, all enlightening beings’ means of training, means of activating innumerable cycles of teachings, means appropriate to unspeakably many times, means of explaining all kinds of methods, means of the boundless treasury of fearlessness, means of explaining all truths; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to live by the practice of Universal Good, accomplish actions that cause all witnesses to rejoice and not give rise to slander or repudiation and to set their minds on enlightenment with ultimate purity, never regressing; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to cultivate the practice of Universal Good and attain pure knowledge of the languages of all sentient beings, fully adorned by all verbal expression to respond to all sentient beings and gladden them;

dge ba'i rtsa ba 'diskun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i spyod yul rab tu rtogs shing chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su 'gro ba 'byams klas pa thams cad dang / zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad dang / sems can 'byams klas pa thams cad dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ye shes brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos 'byams klas pa dang / chos 'byams klas pa'i rgyan de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdzod thams cad nas byung ba dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas rnam par dag pa'i sems kyi rgyud mnyam pa nyid kyis zhugs pa'i ye shes 'byams klas pa rab tu rtogs par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku las byung ba'i lus rnam par dag pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas mos pa rab tu grub pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs la brtson pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul la yang dag par gnas pa dang / ye shes kyi rgyan mtha' yas pas snang bar byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las kyis mngon par byung ba dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad la mkhas pa rnam par dag pa khong du chud par bya ba la rab tu zhugs pa dang / theg pa chen po mtha' yas pa'i rnam par 'phrul pas rab tu byung ba dang / 'gro ba mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba yang dag par bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam dang / yongs su bsngo ba yongs su rdzogs pa thob par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis mnyam pa nyid kyi smon lam gyi dbang pos brtson zhing chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su dbang po rno ba dang / dbang po dge ba dang / chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i dbang po dang / mi zad pa'i dbang po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brtson pa'i dbang po dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i dbang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lung bstan pa la phyir mi ldog par shin tu brtson pa'i dbang po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu phugs pa'i dbang po rdo rje'i khams lta bu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes mtha' dang dbus med pa'i snang bar tu thob pas/ rdo rje'i 'od 'phro ba'i dbang po dang / dbang po rab tu dbye ba thams cad ma lus pa la dbang sgyur ba'i dbang po dang / sems can mu med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbang po la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir/ dbang po mtha' yas pa 'byams klas pa dang / dbang po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i dbang po bsgribs pa med cing / rnam par dag pa rab tu thob par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'diskun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rab tu brtson pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / tshad med par 'byams klas pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / ye shes mtha' yas pas khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / lus ma g.yos par sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun tu bstan pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang chags pa med cing / thogs pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing byin gyis brlab cing / yang dag par bstan pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pas rnam par rtse ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i sems skad cig gi rdzu 'phrul dang / dngos po med pa la rab tu gnas pas mi rten pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / skra'i sbubs gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa rab tu dgod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyu zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pas/ sems can 'byams klas pa thams cad rnam par bstan pa'i ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa'i rdzu 'phrul rab tu thob par gyur cig/

with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to abide by the practice of Universal Good and establish an extraordinary will, have a pure mind, attain great spiritual powers and vast knowledge and wisdom, and go to all vast worlds and vast lands, and to immense congregations of sentient beings expound unspeakably many far-reaching teachings of the Buddhas, their treasuries full of vast adornments; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to fulfill the practice and vows of dedication of Universal Good and attain the pure body, pure mind, and pure understanding of all Buddhas, embody the virtues of buddhahood, abide in the realm of buddhahood, universally illumining with the seal of knowledge, revealing the pure deeds of enlightening beings, entering into the meanings of all different expressions, demonstrating the tremendous freedom of the Buddhas and enlightening beings, and for the sake of all sentient beings manifest the attainment of true enlightenment; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to diligently cultivate the practical commitments of the faculties of Universal Good and attain clear, sharp faculties, well-tuned faculties, faculties free in all ways, inexhaustible faculties, faculties diligently cultivating all roots of goodness, equanimous faculties of the range of all Buddhas, faculties of great vigor giving all enlightening beings the prediction of nonregression, faculties knowing the realm of indestructibility of all Buddhas, faculties of adamantine flames of the illuminating light of knowledge of all Buddhas, faculties freely distinguishing all capacities, faculties for establishing all sentient beings in universal knowledge, boundlessly vast faculties, totally complete faculties, pure unhindered faculties; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to cultivate the practice of Universal Good and attain all enlightening beings’ spiritual powers—spiritual powers of boundlessly great strength, spiritual powers of immeasurable independent knowledge, spiritual power to appear in all buddha-fields without physically moving, spiritual power of unhindered, uninterrupted freedom, spiritual power to concentrate all buddha-fields in one place, spiritual power to pervade all buddha-fields with one body, spiritual power of unhindered, liberated roaming, spiritual power of instantaneous freedom without doing anything, spiritual power abiding in essencelessness and nonreliance, and spiritual power to progressively set up untold worlds in a single pore, traveling to all Buddhas’ enlightenment sites throughout the cosmos to teach sentient beings and cause them all to enter the door of great knowledge;

dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu dag pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i ye shes kyis 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' dang dbus med par rab tu zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi sa dang / skye ba med pa la brtson pa'i sems bskyed pa la 'jug pa dang / kun tu bzang pos rtogs pa'i sgo nas 'jug pas rab tu 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu thob pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa re rer lus kun tu dgye ba'i byin gyi rlabs shin tu bstan pas zhing gi rgyud la rab tu zhugs par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su sangs rgyas kyi rigs su 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyud la gnas shing / rnam pa'i tshul tha dad pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas rnam par phye ba thob ste/ tshad med pa'i smon lam la yang dag par brtson zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang / dus gsum gyi chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu zhugs pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i tshul kun shes pa dang / rab tu shes pa dang rjes su rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi dbyings la rab tu zhugs par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i sgos rnam par dag par byas pa'i mig gi sgo dang ldan zhing / chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su skra'i sbubs re re zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i zhing rnams yang dag par 'dzud pa rab tu shes par gyur cig/ de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings thams cad la 'jug pa nye bar bzung ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa gyur te/ skra'i sbubs gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings thams cad nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i skra'i sbubs thams cad du 'dzud pa la rab tu mkhas par gyur cig/ shin tu shes par gyur cig / mngon par rtogs par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su sems kyi skad cig gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal pa lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par ston par byed cing / mtha' dang dbus med pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pas mthong bar gyur cig/ rab tu zhugs par gyur cig/ de bzhin du sems can gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa'i sems kyi skad cig la 'jug pa'i tshul du/ tshul 'di kun tu bzang po la brtson pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su shes par gyur cig/ rab tu rtogs par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems kyis lus re rer yang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i lus yongs su 'dzud pa mthong bar gyur cig/ rab tu rtogs par gyur cig/ lus gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du lus 'byams klas pa la 'jug pa thams cad ma lus par nye bar bzung ste/ sems can gyi khams thams cad ma tshang ba med pa dang / lhag pa med par shes pa'i sems bskyed pa chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab pa/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas yongs su bsngos pas/ tshul gyis 'di la rab tu zhugs par gyur cig/

with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to enter the door of Universal Good, produce the practices of enlightening beings, and with independent knowledge enter into innumerable buddha-lands in a single instant, contain immeasurable buddha-lands in one body, attain knowledge of how to purify buddha-lands, and always observe boundless buddha-lands with knowledge and wisdom, never developing the mentality of individual salvation; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to cultivate the practices of expedient means of Universal Good, enter the realm of wisdom, be born in the house of the enlightened, abide in the path of enlightening beings, fulfill infinite supreme aspirations, carry out infinite vows without ever ceasing, and know all realms of reality of all times; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to accomplish the pure teaching of Universal Good, able to contain the innumerable worlds of the cosmos throughout all space in a spot as big as a hairtip, causing all to be clearly seen, with the same applying to every single point throughout the space of the cosmos; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to accomplish the profound mental techniques of Universal Good, able in a single mental moment to manifest the states of mind of one sentient being over untold eons, and in the same way manifest the states of mind of all sentient beings over untold eons; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to enter the stage of employment of techniques of dedication of Universal Good, able to contain in one body the unspeakably unspeakable numbers of bodies throughout the cosmos, without there being any increase or decrease in the realm of sentient beings, and as of one body, so also of all bodies throughout the cosmos, so all contain all in the same way;

dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su/ sangs rgyas thams cad rtog par bya ba rab tu rtogs shing / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang bral ba med cing mtshan gyis rnam par 'phrul ba'i sku dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rab tu dgye ba/ rgyun chad pa med pas snang bar mdzad pas gang ba rab tu chud par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa de dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag kyang kun tu bzang po'i smon lam yangs pa rgya chen po dang 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'du shes phyin ci log dang / sems phyin ci log dang / lta ba phyin ci log las 'phags pa'i lta ba dang / phyin ci log thams cad spangs pa'i tshul gyis dmigs su med par rab tu rtogs par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas shing chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la mig 'phrul rnam par dbye ba'i tshul dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad gzhi mnyam pas rnam par dbye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs la tshul gcig tu 'jug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la rnam pa du mar rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad la tshul gcig tu 'jug pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du rnam pa tha dad pa kun tu dgye dbar 'gal ba med pa'i tshul la rab tu 'jug pas 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad dang / snrel zhir rgyu ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams la rab tu 'jug pa dang / spyi'i tshugs su rgyu ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams la rab tu 'jug pa dang / phyogs kyi dra ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rgyud dang / zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad la 'jug pa yongs su shes par gyur cig/ rab tu rtogs par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su spyod pa'i ye shes rin po ches 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad la 'jug par bsgoms pa'i ye shes kyi sa la yang dag par gnas shing 'du shes kyi rnam pa 'di lta ste/ sems can du 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / chos su 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / zhing du 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / phyogs su 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa dang / dus su 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / las su 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / spyod par 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / khams su 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / mos par 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / dbang por 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / dus su 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / byin gyi rlabs su 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / nyon mongs par 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / rnam par byang bar 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / yongs su smin par 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong bar 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / chos bshad pa kun shes par bya bar 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / 'dul bar 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / 'byung ba rnam pa tha dad par 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / sa sna tshogs dang / sa du mar 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'jug par 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gnas su 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang; byang chub sems dpa'i snyoms par 'jug par 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las ldang bar 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig par 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'du bar 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'chi 'pho bar 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skye bar 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar par 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul bar 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs su 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yul du 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / 'jig pa dang 'du ba'i bskal par 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / nyin mtshan dang / rab rib med pa dang / snang bar 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig dang / lo dang dus 'gyur bar 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / 'greng ba dang 'dug par 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang / 'du shes pa'i rnam pa de dag dang / 'du shes kyi rnam pa'i sa de dag thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing / 'du shes thams cad rnam bar spangs pa'i yid dang / chags pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i sems dang / bsgribs pa thams cad rab tu spangs pa'i yid kyis yang dag par rtog pa dang ldan zhing; de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gsal bar byas pa'i ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis mngon par brlan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la yang dag par gnas pa'i chos dkar po thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa shin tu brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi gtso bo kun tu bzang po'i spyad pa spyod pas dbang bskur ba'i smon lam dang ldan pas sems kyi skad cig gcig la 'jug par shes par gyur cig/ mthong bar gyur cig/ rab tu shes par gyur cig/ zhugs par gyur cig/ shin tu sgrub par gyur cig/ yongs su rgyas par byed par gyur cig/ yongs su shes par gyur cig /rab tu rtogs par gyur cig/ rjes su thob par gyur cig/ rab tu 'phel bar byed par gyur cig/ byin gyis rlob par byed par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis'gro ba thams cad la rnam pa bzang po'i spyod pa'i ye shes rin po che dang / kun tu bzang po'i 'byung ba rtsom pa rlabs po che dang / chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems re re la sems tshad med pa yongs su 'dzud par byed cing yang dag par rten pa dang / rnam par rtog par gyur pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs su gyur pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyi las dang / tshad med pa'i las dang / mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i las dang / sems rnam pa sna tshogs dang / bsam pa rnam pa tha dad pas byung zhing yang dag par gzhol bar gyur pas rab tu shes par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'diskun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang / ye shes chen po rin po che dang / chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su skye mched re re zhing brjod du med pa'i skye mched rab tu gzud pa dang / de bzhin du skye mched 'byams klas pa la rab tu 'jug pa shes par gyur cig/ rab tu shes par gyur cig/ khong du chud par gyur cig/ shin tu rtogs par gyur cig /

with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to accomplish the means of the vows of Universal Good, abandon all delusions of thought, mind, and view, and enter the sphere of all Buddhas and always see the pure Buddhas’ reality-body, equal to space, to be adorned with the marks and embellishments of buddhahood, master spiritual powers, and always teach unimpededly and uninterruptedly with a sublime voice, causing all who hear to absorb and retain what they have been taught, and to realize the body of enlightenment has no acquisition; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to cultivate the practice of Universal Good and abide in the stages of enlighenment, in a single moment entering all worlds—upright worlds, inverted worlds, untold numbers of immense worlds in the ten directions enmeshing all locations—and with the means of distinction of the cosmic net of Indra, distinguish all reality-realms, having various worlds enter one world, having untold infinities of worlds enter one world, having the infinite worlds structured by all realms of phenomena and principles enter one world, having the infinite worlds established in all realms of space enter one world, yet without destroying the features of their structures, causing all to be clearly seen; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to cultivate Universal Good’s practical vows of enlightening and be crowned by the Buddha, instantly entering the stage of skill in means, fully developing the treasure of knowledge steadfastly living by enlightening practices, capable of comprehensive knowledge of all perceptions—perceptions of sentient beings, perceptions of phenomena, perceptions of fields, perceptions of locations, perceptions of Buddha, perceptions of worlds, perceptions of action, perceptions of practices, perceptions of realms, perceptions of understandings, perceptions of faculties, perceptions of time, perceptions of continuity, perceptions of afflictions, perceptions of purity, perceptions of maturation, perceptions of seeing Buddha, perceptions of turning the wheel of teaching, perceptions of hearing the teaching and understanding, perceptions of training, perceptions of infinity, perceptions of emancipation, perceptions of various stages, perceptions of innumerable stages, perceptions of knowledge of enlightening beings, perceptions of training of enlightening beings, perceptions of concentrations of enlightening beings, perceptions of enlightening beings emerging from concentration, perceptions of the becoming of enlightening beings, perceptions of disintegration of enlightening beings, perceptions of the demise of enlightening beings, perceptions of the birth of enlightening beings, perceptions of the liberation of enlightening beings, perceptions of the independence of enlightening beings, perceptions of the preservation of enlightening beings, perceptions of the spheres of enlightening beings, perceptions of the formation and decay of ages, perceptions of light, perceptions of darkness, perceptions of day, perceptions of night, perceptions of changes of the fortnight, month, season, and year, perceptions of going, perceptions of coming, perceptions of standing still, perceptions of sitting, perceptions of sleeping, perceptions of waking—able to know all these perceptions in an instant of thought, while at the same time detached from all perceptions, without arbitrary discrimination, cutting through all barriers, without any attachments, the knowledge of all Buddhas filling their minds, all Buddha teachings developing their roots of goodness, having the same one body as all Buddhas, in the keeping of all Buddhas, free from defilement, thoroughly pure, cultivating all Buddha teachings as appropriate, reaching the other shore; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to cultivate the practice of Universal Good for the sake of all sentient beings and produce the jewel of great knowledge, knowing infinite minds in each individual mind, seeing clearly their various fixations, notions, various natures, doings, functions, features, thoughts, and awareness; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to perfect the jewel of knowledge of the great vows of Universal Good, knowing infinite places in one place, and likewise in all places;

dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / las la rab tu brtson pa'i ye shes kyi sa dang / chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su las 'byams klas pa re re la las mngon par 'du bya ba brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa/ rkyen sna tshogs kyis mngon par 'du byas pa rnams yang dag par gzud pa dang / las 'byams klas pa gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du las kyi mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad kyis las kyi yul sna tshogs su dmigs pa la brtson par byed pa shes par gyur cig/ rab tu shes par gyur cig/ ye shes shin tu thob par gyur cig/ yongs su rdzogs par byed par gyur cig /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su chos re re la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos yang dag par gzud pa rab tu shes par gyur cig /chos gcig po de yang chos thams cad du yang dag par gzud pa rab tu shes par gyur cig/ chos rnam par phye ba yang rab tu shes par gyur cig/ ma chags pa dang 'gal ba med par yang chud par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po'i chags pa med pa'i rgyud du gyur pa la gnas shing thams cad shes pas chags pa med pa dang; grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su chos bstan pa re re la chos bstan pa rnam par phye ba 'byams klas pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa gzhan dang / gzhan yongs su smin par bya bas yang dag par bsdus pa/ 'dul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas yang dag par bsdus pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i dus su yang dag par bshad pa/ dus thams cad du sems can gyi dbang po dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du go bar byed pa/ sems can gyi mthu ji bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dbyangs kyis rnam par rig par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung gcig gis brjod du med pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sems can 'byams klas pa rnam pa tha dad pa mngon par dga' bar byed pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa rgya cher byed pa/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu gnas shing kun tu bzang po'i sa la rab tu zhugs pa'i sems kyis yongs su shes par gyur cig/ rab tu shes par gyur cig; khong du chud par gyur cig/ sems skad cig/ sems skad cig cing khong du chud pa'i ye shes kyis ji skad du brjod pa'i chos 'byams klas pa la 'jug pas/ khong du chud par gyur cig/ sems kyi skad cig brjod du med pas rnam par spel ba'i ye shes kyi phung po chen pos phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i mur phyin par zhing 'byams klas pa thams cad du spyod cing ston par gyur cig / kun tu bzang po'i dmigs pa ye shes chen po la brtson pa dang / spyod pa brtsams pa thams cad rab tu 'grub par byed pa'i kun tu bzang po'i sas/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad spyod pa la 'jug pa bral ba med pas yongs su rgyas par byed par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i sgo la rab tu brtson pa'i dbang pos chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyal po rab tu thob cing bsam pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rnam par phye ba la gnas pa dang / dmigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / spyod pa dge bas byung bas dbang po re re la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yang dag par gzud par yongs su shes par gyur cig/ rab tu shes par gyur cig/ shin tu rtogs par gyur cig / khong du chud par gyur cig/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i sems dang / rmongs pa med pa'i sems dang; 'khrugs pa med pa'i sems dang / rnam par 'khrugs pa med pa'i sems dang / bslad pa med pa'i sems dang / dbang po mi dma' ba'i sems dang / rtse gcig pa'i sems dang; shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems dang / chos shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sems dang / ye shes shin tu bstan pa'i sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba'i rjes su song ba'i sems kyis gzugs shin tu phra ba dang / lus shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / zhing shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / bskal pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / yul shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / dus shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / chos kyi grangs shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / rnam par dag pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / shin tu phra ba 'di dag thams cad sems kyi skad cig gcig tu brkyang ba'i ye shes byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i rjes su song bas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes par gyur cig/ shin tu rtogs par gyur cig /khong du chud par gyur cig/

with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to cultivate the stage of knowledge of practice of Universal Good, and in one action be able to know all actions, clearly seeing the various conditions making up those actions, and as of one action, so of all actions; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to cultivate and learn Universal Good’s knowledge of all things, knowing infinite things in one thing, knowing one thing in all things, these things each different, without obstruction, without opposition or attachment; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to live by the practice of enlightening beings and acquire the unobstructed ear faculty of Universal Good, in the sound of one utterance knowing the boundless differentiations in countless utterances, without clinging, and as of one utterance, so of all utterances; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to cultivate the knowledge of Universal Good, initiate the practice of Universal Good, and abide in the state of Universal Good, in each individual principle expounding countless principles, those principles far-reaching, variously different, teaching, transforming, saving, in accord with inconceivable expedient means, at all times, in accord with the inclinations, understandings, and faculties of sentient beings, in accord with the time expounding the teaching for them with the voice of Buddha, with one marvelous voice gladdening innumerable sentient beings in the congregations at unspeakably many sites of enlightenment, so the innumerable enlightening beings with all Buddhas fill the cosmos, making extraordinary determinations, producing great insights, ultimately knowing all practices abiding in the state of Universal Good, according to the principles explained able to enter moment to moment into the space of a single instant and develop and increase a store of infinite great knowledge forever and ever—to teach this way, to cultivate in all fields great practices equal to space, fully perfecting them; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to cultivate the methods of operation of the faculties of Universal Good, becoming masters of great action, in each and every faculty able to know innumerable faculties, innumerable mental inclinations, and the sublime practice born of the realm of inconceivability; with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to live by the heart of great dedication practice by Universal Good and attain the most subtle knowledge of form, the most subtle knowledge of bodies, the most subtle knowledge of lands, the most subtle knowledge of ages, the most subtle knowledge of worlds, the most subtle knowledge of places, the most subtle knowledge of times, the most subtle knowledge of numbers, the most subtle knowledge of consequences of actions, and the most subtle knowledge of purity, able to know all such subtleties instantly, without fear, confusion, distraction, cloudiness, or depression of mind, being single-minded, skilled in quiet concentration and discernment, the mind well stabilized;

dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su rag las pa med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas shing / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la brtson pa'i spyod pa chen po la dub pa med par gnas shing / sems can gyi rgyud shin tu phra ba dang / sems can gyi shi 'pho shin tu phra ba dang / sems can skye ba shin tu phra ba dang / sems can gyi gnas shin tu phra ba dang / sems can gyi rten shin tu phra ba dang / sems can mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rigs shin tu phra ba dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi yul shin tu phra ba dang / sems can gyi 'du byed pa shin tu phra ba dang / sems can bstan pa shin tu phra ba dang / sems can dmigs pa shin tu phra ba shin tu phra ba 'di dag dang / shin tu phra ba la 'jug pa ji snyed pa gang yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad sems gcig brkyang ba'i spyod pa'i ye shes kyis shes par gyur cig/ khong du chud par gyur cig/

with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to abide in the knowledge of enlightening beings and cultivate the practice of Universal Good tirelessly, able to know the details of the tendencies of sentient beings, the details of the deaths of sentient beings, the details of the births of sentient beings, the details of the subsistence of sentient beings, the details of the locations of sentient beings, the details of the types of sentient beings, the details of the realms of sentient beings, the details of the acts of sentient beings, the details of the grasping of sentient beings, the details of sentient beings’ clinging to objects, able to know all such details instantly;

dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu brtson pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thog ma sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gnas shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par 'gro ba shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos snang ba rab tu thob pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mig rnam par dag pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su grub pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro bar shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi sgo shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'jigs pa med pa'i sa mtha' dang dbus med pa/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa thams cad kyi mdzod kyi 'od shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mtha' dang dbus med pa'i mtshan ma shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i rab tu shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zab mo mngon par bsgrub pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i rgyan shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba chen po'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang / ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mur spyod pa yang dag par gzung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par dbye ba mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang mngon sum du zhabs kyi drung na 'dug kyang sangs rgyas gcig dang yang bral ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rgya che zhing yangs pa dang / zab cing bsgribs pa med pa dang / chags pa med pa la rab tu brtson pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug par spyod pa yang dag par gzung ba'i mdzod shes pa'i sa khong du chud pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i sa rab tu thob pa dang / don gyi sa shin tu rtogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba thams cad shes par gyur cig / rab tu rtogs par gyur cig /

with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to establish profound determination, cultivate the practice of Universal Good, and be able to know the details of efforts of all enlightening beings for the sake of living creatures from their first inspiration—the details of cultivation of enlightening beings’ practices, the details of enlightening beings’ abodes, the details of enlightening beings’ spiritual powers, the details of enlightening beings’ travels to innumerable buddha-lands, the details of enlightening beings’ pure eyes, the details of enlightening beings’ development of transcendent mentality, the details of enlightening beings’ visits to congregations at enlightenment sites of all Buddhas, the details of enlightening beings’ knowledge of methods of concentration spells, the details of enlightening beings’ expositions of the treasury of all skills of analysis and elucidation of the stage of infinite fearlessness, the details of the characteristics of innumerable concentrations of enlightening beings, the details of enlightening beings’ knowledge of concentration on vision of all Buddhas, the details of enlightening beings’ knowledge of extremely deep concentration, the details of enlightening beings’ knowledge of concentration on great adornments, the details of enlightening beings’ knowledge of concentration in great autonomous spiritual powers, the details of enlightening beings’ knowledge of concentration on preservation of great practices throughout the future, the details of enlightening beings’ knowledge of production of innumerable different concentrations, the details of enlightening beings’ knowledge of concentration on being born in the presence of all Buddhas and diligent practice of service of the Buddhas, never leaving them, the details of enlightening beings’ knowledge of cultivation of all profound, vast, unobstructed states of concentration, the details of enlightening beings’ unobscured knowledge of concentration of the stage of consummation of universal knowledge, the stage of knowledge and practice of preservation, the stage of great spiritual powers, and the stage of certitude of meaning, able to know all such details completely;

dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su bsngo ba mngon par bsgrub pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gter rab tu thob pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes rnam par dpyad pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rnam par 'phrul ba shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi tshul shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyag rgya shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshe gcig gis 'thob pa la'ang dbang bsgyur ba shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ldan gyi gnas su skyes pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i pho brang gi gnas na 'dug pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mi'i 'jig rten na dga' bar gnas pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dgye ba shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs rnam par dbye ba shin tu phra ba dang; byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dbye ba shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par skye ba shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus gcig gis shi 'phos pa rnam par tha dad pa bstan pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba shin tu phra ba dang; byang chub sems dpa'i mngal du song nas gnas pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i mngal na rnam par 'phrul bas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gcig par ma'i ltor shong pa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ma'i mngal na sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba thams cad yang dag par bstan pa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshe shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gom pa bdun du seng+ge'i stabs su 'gro ba'i ye shes shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na thabs mkhas pa yang dag par ston pa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'byung ba'i tshul dang spyod pa rab tu sbyor ba shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi shing drung du 'dug pa shin tu phra ba dang / byang chub sems dpas bdud kyi sde rab tu pham par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba shin tu phra ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi gdan la 'dug ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu dgye ba shin tu phra ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba yang dag par bstan pa shin tu phra ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i nga ro phyung ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa chen po shin tu phra ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad gdul ba'i 'khor du thogs pa med pa shin tu phra ba dang; de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la byang chub kyi sems rdo rje lta bu yongs su shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad rgyas pa 'gengs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs yongs su bstan pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par rgyun mi 'chad pa shin tu phra ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar thug par thogs pa med pa shin tu phra ba dang / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa'i zhing gi yul thams cad du sems can 'dul bar sangs rgyas skye ba bstan pa shin tu phra ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku gcig sangs rgyas kyi sku tha dad pa rab tu spro ba'i shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyu mchog gi mthu dbyung ba'i ye shes shin tu phra ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sems kyi skad cig re re zhing rnam par 'phel ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sbyor ba phyir mi ldog cing rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / kun tu bzang por rab tu 'phros pa'i yongs su bsngo ba'i sa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khong na yang dag par 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba med pas byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sgo'i dkyil 'khor dang / spyod pa 'byams klas pa la brtson pa shin tu rnam par sbyangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la dmigs pa 'gro ba thams cad bde bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang bsam pas chen por bsgrubs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'dul ba'i dmigs pa'i mdzod kyi yongs su bsngo ba'i sgo rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jug pa'i sgo de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs pa dang / chos bstan pa 'gal ba med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad kyi don la rab tu bstan pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyis mi bsgul ba'i dam bcas pa shin tu rgya che ba dang / sems skad cig gis mthar phyin pa'i 'jug pa dang; dmigs pa'i mdzod sems dang sems ma yin pa'i sa thams cad rab tu rtogs pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa'i sgo sems ma yin pa'i sems mngon par bsgrubs pa dang; ye shes kyis tshig gi lam thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa dang / spyod pas mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i byin gyi rlabs byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur ba dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor phyi ma'i mtha'i mur rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'gro ba'i rtogs pa dang / 'du shes kyi rnam pa dang / tshig gi lam du gdags pas gtugs pa'i byin gyi rlabs khyad par gyi smon lam chen pos rnam par 'phrul pas khong du chud par gyur cig /rab tu shes par gyur cig /shin tu sgrub par gyur cig /rnam par spyod par gyur cig / 'gro ba kun tu yang dag par ston par gyur cig /

with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to cultivate the practice of Universal Good and know the details of all enlightening beings’ knowledge of structures, the details of enlightening beings’ stages, the details of enlightening beings’ innumerable activities, the details of enlightening beings’ production of dedication, the details of enlightening beings’ attainment of the treasuries of all Buddhas, the details of enlightening beings’ analytic knowledge, the details of enlightening beings’ spiritual capabilities and will power, the subtleties of enlightening beings’ explanations of concentration, the details of enlightening beings’ versatile skill in means, the details of the gestures of enlightening beings, the details of enlightening beings’ life on the threshold of buddhahood, the details of enlightening beings’ birth in Tushita heaven, the details of enlightening beings’ sojourn in the celestial palace, the details of enlightening beings’ purification of a buddha-land, the details of enlightening beings’ observation of the human world, the details of enlightening beings radiating great light, the details of the excellence of families of enlightening beings, the details of the congregations at the enlightenment sites of enlightening beings, the details of enlightening beings’ birth throughout all worlds, the details of enlightening beings’ manifestation of the end of a life of all bodies in one body, the details of enlightening beings entering their mothers’ wombs, the details of enlightening beings’ life in their mothers’ wombs, the details of enlightening beings’ free manifestation of the congregations at the sites of enlightenment in all realms while yet in their mothers’ wombs, the details of enlightening beings’ manifestation of the spiritual powers of all Buddhas while in their mothers’ wombs, the details of enlightening beings’ manifestation of birth, the details of the knowledge of enlightening beings walking seven steps like a lion, the details of enlightening beings’ knowledge of skill in means, expediently appearing to abide in a royal palace, the details of enlightening beings leaving home and cultivating practices for self-mastery, the details of enlightening beings sitting under trees of enlightenment at sites of enlightenment, the details of enlightening beings conquering armies of demons and attaining unexcelled complete perfect enlightenment, the details of the realized ones sitting on the seat of enlightenment and emanating great light illumining the worlds of the ten directions, the details of the enlightened ones showing innumerable mystical transfigurations, the details of the enlightened ones’ lion roar and great extinction, the details of the enlightened ones taming all sentient beings without hindrance, the details of the enlightened ones’ inconceivable autonomous powers like the adamantine mind of enlightenment, the details of the enlightened ones minding all worlds, the details of the enlightened ones doing buddha work in all worlds forever and ever without ceasing, the details of the enlightened ones’ unobstructed spiritual powers pervading the cosmos, the details of the enlightened ones appearing in all worlds throughout space to fulfill buddhahood and tame sentient beings, the details of the enlightened ones manifesting innumerable buddha-bodies in one buddha-body, the details of the enlightened ones’ knowledge of the freedom to be at the site of enlightenment in the past, future, and present, completely knowing all such minute details with consummate clarity, able to manifest appearance in all worlds, moment to moment increasing in knowledge, perfecting non-regressive skill in liberative means, cultivating enlightening practice without ceasing, fulfilling the stage of dedication of Universal Good, attaining the virtues of all Buddhas, never tiring of or giving up what enlightening beings practice, producing the enlightening beings’ state of presence, with innumerable means of enlightenment, all pure, wishing to pacify all sentient beings, cultivating the deeds of enlightening beings and accomplishing the enlightening beings’ stage of great power, attaining the aspiration of the enlightening mind, reaching the gate of dedication of Diamond Banner, producing the treasury of qualities of the realm of truth, always in the care of the Buddhas, entering the doors of the profound principles of enlightening beings, expounding all true meanings, flawlessly skilled in teaching, carrying out great vows, never abandoning sentient beings, thoroughly knowing the mine of conceivable and inconceivable realms, demonstrating the production of thought in the realm of inconceivability, detaching from verbal expression, abiding in knowledge, doing as all enlightening beings do, with the power of spiritual freedom demonstrating the path of attainment of Buddhahood forever and ever without cease, by spiritual power and the power of vows able to show all worlds, sentient beings, and ages, defined by illusory ideas and speech;

dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su sems can gyi khams thams cad la 'jug par shes pa shin tu phra ba dang; sems can gyi khams rnam par dbye ba shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / sems can gyi khams sna tshogs rtogs par bstan pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / sems can gyi khams du ma'i mngon par zhen pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / sems can gyi khams kyi bye brag tha dad par shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / sems can gyi khams skal ba mnyam pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa'i lam gyi rgyud shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / sems can gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa mngon par 'du bya ba sna tshogs rnam par rtog par gyur pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / sems can mtha' yas pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / sems can grangs med pa'i rnam par byang ba shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / sems can gyi khams kyi yul shes pa shin tu phra ba 'di dag dang shes pa shin tu phra ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sems skad cig dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi phung po dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / dus ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pas 'dul ba yongs su bzung ba dang / dus thams cad du chos kyi sgo brjod du med pa rab tu bstan cing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu brtson pa'i ye shes 'byams klas pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dga' ba'i gnas su gyur pa'i lus brjod du med pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems la zhugs pa ye shes kyi nyi mas snang bar byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems mngon par rdzogs pa'i byin gyi rlabs byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / ye shes chen po 'byams klas pa dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu brtson pa'i 'jug pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par gyur cig/ rab tu shes par gyur cig /

with unattached, unbound, liberated mind to cultivate the practice of Universal Good and attain knowledge of the minute details of the realms of all sentient beings—knowledge of the details of distinctions of realms of sentient beings, knowledge of the details of the verbal expression of realms of sentient beings, knowledge of the details of the attachments in realms of sentient beings, knowledge of the details of the different species in the realms of sentient beings, knowledge of the details of similar species in the realms of sentient beings, knowledge of the details of the innumerable tendencies in the realms of sentient beings, knowledge of the details of the inconceivably many artifices of various conceptions in the realms of sentient beings, knowledge of the details of the immeasurable pollution in the realms of sentient beings, knowledge of the details of the immeasurable purity in the realms of sentient beings—able to instantly know such minute details as these of all realms of sentient beings, knowing them as they truly are, widely expounding the truth for sentient beings, showing them various kinds of pure teachings and practices to enable them to cultivate the vast knowledge and wisdom of enlightening beings, emanating countless bodies, gladdening to all who see, illumining enlightening beings’ minds with the sun of knowledge, causing their understanding to open up and their wisdom to be freed;

dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems su 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad shes pa shin tu phra ba 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams cher gyur pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya chen po shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dog pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par sangs rgyas skye bas rgyas par dgang ba shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par rab tu snang bar bya ba shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par lus kyis rgyas par dgang ba shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par 'od zer rab tu dgye bas snang bar bya ba shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par bstan pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par dbyangs gcig gis dbyangs thams cad rnam par bstan cing rgyas par dgang ba shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis sangs rgyas kyi sku kun nas bskor bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la 'jug pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus par sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu byin gyis brlabs pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad ma lus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byin gyis brlabs pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par rmi lam lta bur 'jug pa shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par mig yor lta bur rnam par dmigs pas rgyas par dgang ba shes pa shin tu phra ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams shes pa shin tu phra ba 'di dag dang / shes pa shin tu phra ba de dag thams cad byang
